trans-unit.source: TARGET_SUPPORTS_SHARED_LIBS is a boolean specifying whether the target platform supports shared libraries. Basically all current general general purpose OS do so, the exception are usually embedded systems with no or special OSs.
trans-unit.target: TARGET_SUPPORTS_SHARED_LIBS是一个布尔值,指定目标平台是否支持共享库。基本上目前所有通用的通用操作系统都支持,例外的通常是没有操作系统或特殊操作系统的嵌入式系统。

trans-unit.source: Takes a <version> argument composed of non-negative integer components, i.e. <major>[.<minor>[.<patch>[.<tweak>]]], and sets the variables
trans-unit.target: 接受由非负整数组成的 <version> 参数，即 <major>[.<minor>[.<patch>[.<tweak>]]] 并设置变量

trans-unit.source: Takes a list of Key=Value pairs. Tells the Visual Studio generator to set Key to Value as item metadata on all non-built files that use <tool>.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Key=Value 对的列表。告诉Visual Studio生成器将所有使用 <tool> 的非生成文件上的 Key 设置为 Value 作为项目元数据。

trans-unit.source: Takes a list of Key=Value pairs. Tells the Visual Studio generator to set Key to Value as item metadata on the file.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Key=Value 对的列表。告诉Visual Studio生成器将“ Key 设置为“ Value 作为文件上的项目元数据。

trans-unit.source: Takes either a .app directory name or the name of an executable nested inside a .app directory and returns the path to the .app directory in <bundle_var> and the path to its main executable in <executable_var>.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是一个 .app 目录名或可执行嵌套的内侧的名称 .app 目录和返回路径 .app 在目录 <bundle_var> 和在该路径到其主可执行 <executable_var> 。

trans-unit.source: Target file component generator expressions do not add target dependencies.

trans-unit.source: Target for header-only dependencies. (Boost include directory).
Target for specific component dependency (shared or static library); <component> name is lower-case.

trans-unit.target: 从 <lang> 使用OpenACC的目标。

trans-unit.source: Target from which to reuse the precompiled headers build artifact.
trans-unit.target: 重用预编译的头文件构建工件的目标。

trans-unit.source: Target installations are associated with the export <export-name> using the EXPORT option of the install(TARGETS) command.
trans-unit.target: 使用 install(TARGETS) 命令的 EXPORT 选项将目标安装与导出 <export-name> 关联。

trans-unit.source: Target label semantics are currently unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 目标标签语义目前尚未明确。

trans-unit.source: Target library properties can be set to apply same configuration to all SWIG input files.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置目标库属性,将相同的配置应用于所有 SWIG 输入文件。

trans-unit.source: Target link properties INTERFACE_LINK_OPTIONS, INTERFACE_LINK_DIRECTORIES and INTERFACE_LINK_DEPENDS are now transitive over private dependencies of static libraries.
trans-unit.target: 目标链接属性 INTERFACE_LINK_OPTIONS ， INTERFACE_LINK_DIRECTORIES 和 INTERFACE_LINK_DEPENDS 现在可以在静态库的私有依赖项上传递。

trans-unit.source: Target marked with the FRAMEWORK or BUNDLE property generate framework or application bundle (both macOS and iOS is supported) or normal shared libraries on other platforms. This property may be set to a list of files to be placed in the corresponding directory (eg. Resources directory for macOS) inside the bundle. On non-Apple platforms these files may be installed using the RESOURCE option to the install(TARGETS) command.
trans-unit.target: 标有 FRAMEWORK 或 BUNDLE 属性的目标会生成框架或应用程序捆绑包（支持macOS和iOS）或其他平台上的普通共享库。可以将此属性设置为要放置在捆绑软件内相应目录（例如macOS的 Resources 目录）中的文件列表。在非Apple平台上，可以使用 install(TARGETS) 命令的 RESOURCE 选项安装这些文件。

trans-unit.source: Target names associated with optional features, such as test and package, may also be reserved. CMake 3.10 and below always reserve them. CMake 3.11 and above reserve them only when the corresponding feature is enabled (e.g. by including the CTest or CPack modules).
trans-unit.target: 与可选功能（例如 test 和 package )关联的目标名称也可以保留。CMake 3.10及以下版本始终保留它们。CMake 3.11及更高版本仅在启用相应功能时（例如，通过包含 CTest 或 CPack 模块）保留它们。

trans-unit.source: Target names may contain upper and lower case letters, numbers, the underscore character (_), dot(.), plus(+) and minus(-). As a special case, ALIAS and IMPORTED targets may contain two consecutive colons.
trans-unit.target: 目标名称可以包含大写和小写字母，数字，下划线字符（ _ ），点（ . ），加号（ + ）和减号（ - ）。作为一种特殊情况， ALIAS 和 IMPORTED 目标可能包含两个连续的冒号。

trans-unit.source: Target names reserved by one or more CMake generators are not allowed. Among others these include all, clean, help, and install.
trans-unit.target: 不允许一个或多个CMake生成器保留目标名称。其中包括 all ， clean ， help 和 install 。

trans-unit.source: Target names should not be reserved and should match a validity pattern.
trans-unit.target: 目标名称不应保留,应符合有效模式。

trans-unit.source: Target objects define individual build targets for a certain configuration.
trans-unit.target: 目标对象定义了特定配置的单个构建目标。

trans-unit.source: Target specific architectures for macOS and iOS.
trans-unit.target: 针对macOS和iOS的特定架构。

trans-unit.source: Target specific architectures for macOS.
trans-unit.target: 针对macOS的特定架构。

trans-unit.source: Target-Dependent Queries
trans-unit.target: 依赖目标的查询

trans-unit.source: Targets Created:
trans-unit.target: 创建的目标:

trans-unit.source: Targets are aware of their dependencies, so for example it is not necessary to list Qt4::QtCore if another Qt library is listed, and it is not necessary to list Qt4::QtGui if Qt4::QtDeclarative is listed. Targets may be tested for existence in the usual way with the if(TARGET) command.
trans-unit.target: 目标很清楚自己的相关性，因此，例如它是没有必要列出 Qt4::QtCore 如果另一个Qt库上市，这是没有必要列出 Qt4::QtGui 如果 Qt4::QtDeclarative 上市。可以使用 if(TARGET) 命令以通常的方式测试目标的存在。

trans-unit.source: Targets can have properties that affect how they are built.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以具有影响其构建方式的属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets created with the swig_add_library command have the same capabilities as targets created with the add_library() command, so those targets can be used with any command expecting a target (e.g. target_link_libraries()).
trans-unit.target: 使用 swig_add_library 命令创建的目标与使用 add_library() 命令创建的目标具有相同的功能，因此这些目标可以与任何期望目标的命令一起使用（例如 target_link_libraries() ）。

trans-unit.source: Targets inherit the EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL property from the directory that they are created in. When a directory is excluded, all of its targets will have EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL set to TRUE. After creating such a target you can change its EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL property to FALSE. This will cause the target to be included in the default build target.
trans-unit.target: 目标从其创建目录中继承 EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 属性。排除目录后，其所有目标会将 EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 设置为 TRUE 。创建此类目标后，可以将其 EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 属性更改为 FALSE 。这将使目标包含在默认的构建目标中。

trans-unit.source: Targets may not link directly to themselves.
trans-unit.target: 目标不得直接链接到自己。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the compile definitions required to compile against the headers for the target. The target_compile_definitions() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性，以发布针对目标标头进行编译所需的编译定义。该 target_compile_definitions() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the compile definitions required to compile against the headers for the target. The target_compile_definitions() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性，以发布针对目标标头进行编译所需的编译定义。该 target_compile_definitions() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the compile features required to compile against the headers for the target. The target_compile_features() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性，以发布针对目标标头进行编译所需的编译功能。该 target_compile_features() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the compile features required to compile against the headers for the target. The target_compile_features() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性，以发布针对目标标头进行编译所需的编译功能。该 target_compile_features() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the compile options required to compile against the headers for the target. The target_compile_options() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性，以发布针对目标标头进行编译所需的编译选项。该 target_compile_options() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the compile options required to compile against the headers for the target. The target_compile_options() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性，以发布针对目标标头进行编译所需的编译选项。该 target_compile_options() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the header files for consuming targets to precompile. The target_precompile_headers() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly. See the discussion in target_precompile_headers() for guidance on appropriate use of this property for installed or exported targets.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性以发布头文件，以使用目标进行预编译。该 target_precompile_headers() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。请参阅 target_precompile_headers() 中的讨论，以获取有关已安装或已导出目标正确使用此属性的指导。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the include directories required to compile against the headers for the target. The target_include_directories() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性，以发布针对目标标头进行编译所需的包含目录。该 target_include_directories() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the include directories required to compile against the headers for the target. The target_include_directories() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性，以发布针对目标标头进行编译所需的包含目录。该 target_include_directories() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the include directories which contain system headers, and therefore should not result in compiler warnings. The target_include_directories(SYSTEM) command signature populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性以发布包含系统头的包含目录，因此不应导致编译器警告。该 target_include_directories(SYSTEM) 命令签名填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the link directories required to compile against the headers for the target. The target_link_directories() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性，以发布针对目标标头进行编译所需的链接目录。该 target_link_directories() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the link directories required to compile against the headers for the target. The target_link_directories() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性，以发布针对目标标头进行编译所需的链接目录。该 target_link_directories() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the link options required to compile against the headers for the target. The target_link_options() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性，以发布针对目标的标头进行编译所需的链接选项。该 target_link_options() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the link options required to compile against the headers for the target. The target_link_options() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性，以发布针对目标标头进行编译所需的链接选项。该 target_link_options() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the options required to use when invoking uic. Consuming targets can add entries to their own AUTOUIC_OPTIONS property such as $<TARGET_PROPERTY:foo,INTERFACE_AUTOUIC_OPTIONS> to use the uic options specified in the interface of foo. This is done automatically by the target_link_libraries() command.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性，以发布调用 uic 时需要使用的选项。消费目标可以自己添加条目 AUTOUIC_OPTIONS 财产，如 $<TARGET_PROPERTY:foo,INTERFACE_AUTOUIC_OPTIONS> 以使用的界面中指定的UIC选项 foo 。这是由 target_link_libraries() 命令自动完成的。

trans-unit.source: Targets may populate this property to publish the sources for consuming targets to compile. The target_sources() command populates this property with values given to the PUBLIC and INTERFACE keywords. Projects may also get and set the property directly.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以填充此属性以发布源以供使用目标进行编译。该 target_sources() 命令填充这个属性给定的值 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 的关键字。项目也可以直接获取和设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Targets names created with add_executable(), add_library(), or add_custom_target() are logical build target names. Logical target names must be globally unique because:
trans-unit.target: 使用 add_executable() ， add_library() 或 add_custom_target() 创建的目标名称是逻辑构建目标名称。逻辑目标名称必须是全局唯一的，因为：

trans-unit.source: Targets on which the javah target depends.
trans-unit.target: javah目标所依赖的目标。

trans-unit.source: Targets package and package_source
trans-unit.target: 目标包和包_source

trans-unit.source: Targets which have their AUTOMOC or AUTOUIC property ON have a corresponding _autogen target which generates moc and uic files. As this _autogen target is created at generate-time, it is not possible to define dependencies of it using e.g. add_dependencies(). Instead the AUTOGEN_ORIGIN_DEPENDS target property decides whether the origin target dependencies should be forwarded to the _autogen target or not.
trans-unit.target: 具有 AUTOMOC 或 AUTOUIC 属性为 ON 的目标具有相应的 _autogen 目标，该目标会生成 moc 和 uic 文件。由于此 _autogen 目标是在生成时创建的，因此无法使用例如 add_dependencies() 定义其依赖关系。相反， AUTOGEN_ORIGIN_DEPENDS 目标属性决定是否应将原始目标依赖项转发到 _autogen 目标。

trans-unit.source: Targets which have their AUTOMOC or AUTOUIC property ON have a corresponding _autogen target which generates moc and uic files. As this _autogen target is created at generate-time, it is not possible to define dependencies of it using e.g. add_dependencies(). Instead the AUTOGEN_TARGET_DEPENDS target property can be set to a ;-list of additional dependencies for the _autogen target. Dependencies can be target names or file names.
trans-unit.target: 具有 AUTOMOC 或 AUTOUIC 属性为 ON 的目标具有相应的 _autogen 目标，该目标会生成 moc 和 uic 文件。由于此 _autogen 目标是在生成时创建的，因此无法使用例如 add_dependencies() 定义其依赖关系。代替 AUTOGEN_TARGET_DEPENDS 目标属性可以被设置为一; -list的用于附加依赖性 _autogen 目标。依赖关系可以是目标名称或文件名。

trans-unit.source: Targets with no FOLDER property will appear as top level entities in IDEs like Visual Studio. Targets with the same FOLDER property value will appear next to each other in a folder of that name. To nest folders, use FOLDER values such as ‘GUI/Dialogs’ with ‘/’ characters separating folder levels.
trans-unit.target: 没有 FOLDER 属性的目标将在Visual Studio等IDE中显示为顶级实体。具有相同 FOLDER 属性值的目标将在该名称的文件夹中彼此相邻出现。要嵌套文件夹，请使用 FOLDER 值，例如“ GUI / Dialogs”，并使用“ /”字符分隔文件夹级别。

trans-unit.source: Targets with no FOLDER property will appear as top level entities in IDEs like Visual Studio. Targets with the same FOLDER property value will appear next to each other in a folder of that name. To nest folders, use FOLDER values such as 'GUI/Dialogs' with '/' characters separating folder levels.
Tell find_package() to try "Config" mode before "Module" mode if no mode was specified.
Tell find_package() to try “Config” mode before “Module” mode if no mode was specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定任何模式，则告诉 find_package() 在“模块”模式之前尝试“配置”模式。

trans-unit.source: Tell bison to write a report file of the grammar and parser.

Tell bison to write a report file of the grammar and parser. If <file> is given, it specifies path the report file is copied to. [<file>] is left for backward compatibility of this module. Use VERBOSE REPORT_FILE <file>.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 bison 编写语法和解析器的报告文件。如果给出 <file> ，则它指定将报告文件复制到的路径。保留 [<file>] 用于该模块的向后兼容性。使用 VERBOSE REPORT_FILE <file> 。

trans-unit.source: Tell CMake about additional input files to the configuration process. If any named file is modified the build system will re-run CMake to re-configure the file and generate the build system again.
trans-unit.target: 告诉CMake关于配置过程的额外输入文件。如果任何命名的文件被修改,构建系统将重新运行CMake来重新配置文件,并再次生成构建系统。

trans-unit.source: Tell CMake to use the OLD or NEW behavior for a given policy. Projects depending on the old behavior of a given policy may silence a policy warning by setting the policy state to OLD. Alternatively one may fix the project to work with the new behavior and set the policy state to NEW.
trans-unit.target: 告诉CMake在给定策略中使用 OLD 行为或 NEW 行为。取决于给定策略的旧行为的项目可以通过将策略状态设置为 OLD 来静默策略警告。或者，可以修复项目以使其适应新的行为，并将策略状态设置为 NEW 。

trans-unit.source: Tell CTest to suppress most non-error messages that it would have otherwise printed to the console. CTest will still report the new revision of the repository and any conflicting files that were found.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 CTest 抑制大多数非错误信息,否则它将会打印到控制台。CTest 仍然会报告版本库的新版本和任何发现的冲突文件。

trans-unit.target: 告诉 ctest_start() 命令如何在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中检出或初始化源目录。

trans-unit.source: Tell the Visual Studio generator to set the global variable '<variable>' to a given value in the generated Visual Studio project. Ignored on other generators. Qt integration works better if VS_GLOBAL_QtVersion is set to the version FindQt4.cmake found. For example, "4.7.3"

Tells the internal CMake engine that a source file is generated by an outside process such as another build step, or the execution of CMake itself. This information is then used to exempt the file from any existence or validity checks.
trans-unit.target: 告诉内部的 CMake 引擎,一个源文件是由外部进程产生的,比如另一个构建步骤,或者 CMake 本身的执行。这个信息被用来免除文件的存在性或有效性检查。

trans-unit.source: Tells the internal CMake engine that a source file is generated by an outside process such as another build step, or the execution of CMake itself. This information is then used to exempt the file from any existence or validity checks. Generated files are created by the execution of commands such as add_custom_command() and file(GENERATE).
trans-unit.target: 告诉内部CMake引擎源文件是由外部过程（例如另一个构建步骤）或CMake本身的执行生成的。然后，此信息可用于免除文件的任何存在性或有效性检查。通过执行诸如 add_custom_command() 和 file(GENERATE) 之类的命令来创建生成的文件。

trans-unit.source: That is all that is needed to create a basic local install of the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: 这就是创建一个基本的本地安装教程所需要的全部内容。

trans-unit.source: That is all there is to it. We start by including InstallRequiredSystemLibraries. This module will include any runtime libraries that are needed by the project for the current platform. Next we set some CPack variables to where we have stored the license and version information for this project. The version information was set earlier in this tutorial and the license.txt has been included in the top-level source directory for this step.
trans-unit.target: 这就是全部。我们首先包括 InstallRequiredSystemLibraries 。该模块将包括项目当前平台所需的任何运行时库。接下来，我们将一些CPack变量设置为存储该项目的许可证和版本信息的位置。版本信息是在本教程的前面设置的，并且 license.txt 已包含在此步骤的顶级源目录中。

trans-unit.source: That’s it! Now let’s try to build the Downstream project.
trans-unit.target: 而已！现在，让我们尝试构建“ Downstream 项目。

trans-unit.source: That's it! Now let's try to build the Downstream project.
The "Configure" button triggers a new dialog to select the CMake generator to use.

The "linker language" for executable, shared library, and module targets is the language whose compiler will invoke the linker. The LINKER_LANGUAGE target property sets the language explicitly. Otherwise, the linker language is that whose linker preference value is highest among languages compiled and linked into the target. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_PREFERENCE_PROPAGATES variable.
The “Configure” button triggers a new dialog to select the CMake generator to use.
trans-unit.target: “配置”按钮触发一个新对话框，以选择要使用的CMake生成器。

trans-unit.source: The “cache” request will list the cached configuration values.

trans-unit.source: The “dirty” signal is sent whenever the server determines that the configuration of the project is no longer up-to-date. This happens when any of the files that have an influence on the build system is changed.
trans-unit.target: 只要服务器确定项目的配置不再是最新的，就会发送“脏”信号。当更改对构建系统有影响的任何文件时，就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The “dirty” signal may look like this:
trans-unit.target: “脏”信号可能看起来像这样：

trans-unit.source: The “fileChange” signal is sent whenever a watched file is changed. It contains the “path” that has changed and a list of “properties” with the kind of change that was detected. Possible changes are “change” and “rename”.
trans-unit.target: 每当更改观看文件时，都会发送“ fileChange”信号。它包含已更改的“路径”和包含检测到的更改类型的“属性”列表。可能的更改是“更改”和“重命名”。

trans-unit.source: The “fileChange” signal looks like this:
trans-unit.target: “ fileChange”信号如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The “linker language” for executable, shared library, and module targets is the language whose compiler will invoke the linker. The LINKER_LANGUAGE target property sets the language explicitly. Otherwise, the linker language is that whose linker preference value is highest among languages compiled and linked into the target. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_PREFERENCE_PROPAGATES variable.
trans-unit.target: 可执行文件，共享库和模块目标的“链接器语言”是其编译器将调用链接器的语言。该 LINKER_LANGUAGE 目标属性设置明确的语言。否则，链接器语言是其链接器首选项值在已编译并链接到目标的语言中最高的语言。另请参阅 CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_PREFERENCE_PROPAGATES 变量。

trans-unit.source: The (newer) gtest_discover_tests() discovers tests by asking the compiled test executable to enumerate its tests. This is more robust and provides better handling of parameterized tests, and does not require CMake to be re-run when tests change. However, it may not work in a cross-compiling environment, and setting test properties is less convenient.
trans-unit.target: （较新的） gtest_discover_tests() 通过要求编译的测试可执行文件枚举其测试来发现测试。这更加健壮，可以更好地处理参数化测试，并且不需要在测试更改时重新运行CMake。但是，它可能无法在交叉编译环境中使用，并且设置测试属性不太方便。

trans-unit.source: The (older) gtest_add_tests() scans source files to identify tests. This is usually effective, with some caveats, including in cross-compiling environments, and makes setting additional properties on tests more convenient. However, its handling of parameterized tests is less comprehensive, and it requires re-running CMake to detect changes to the list of tests.
trans-unit.target: （较旧的） gtest_add_tests() 扫描源文件以识别测试。这通常是有效的，但有一些注意事项，包括在交叉编译环境中，并且使在测试上设置其他属性更加方便。但是，它对参数化测试的处理不太全面，并且需要重新运行CMake来检测对测试列表的更改。

trans-unit.source: The .netrc file is ignored. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 忽略.netrc文件。这是默认的。

trans-unit.source: The .netrc file is optional, and information in the URL is preferred. The file will be scanned to find which ever information is not specified in the URL.
trans-unit.target: .netrc文件是可选的,URL中的信息是首选。该文件将被扫描以查找URL中未指定的信息。

trans-unit.source: The .netrc file is required, and information in the URL is ignored.
trans-unit.target: .netrc文件是必需的,URL中的信息会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The execute_process() command is a newer more powerful version of exec_program(), but the old command has been kept for compatibility. Both commands run while CMake is processing the project prior to build system generation. Use add_custom_target() and add_custom_command() to create custom commands that run at build time.
trans-unit.target: 该 execute_process() 命令是一个较新的更强大的版本 exec_program() ，但旧的命令已经保持兼容性。CMake在生成系统之前处理项目时，这两个命令都会运行。使用 add_custom_target() 和 add_custom_command() 创建在构建时运行的自定义命令。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_STAGING_PREFIX location is also used as a search prefix by the find_* commands. This can be controlled by setting the CMAKE_FIND_NO_INSTALL_PREFIX variable.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_STAGING_PREFIX 位置也被用作由搜索前缀 find_* 命令。可以通过设置 CMAKE_FIND_NO_INSTALL_PREFIX 变量来控制。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION_MAXIMUM variable may be set to a false value (e.g. OFF, FALSE, or 0) or the SDK version to use as the maximum (e.g. 10.0.14393.0). If unset, the default depends on which version of Visual Studio is targeted by the current generator.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION_MAXIMUM 变量设置为假值（例如 OFF ， FALSE 或 0 ）或将SDK版本用作最大值（例如 10.0.14393.0 ）。如果未设置，则默认值取决于当前生成器所针对的Visual Studio版本。

trans-unit.source: The CPACK_GENERATOR variable has different meanings in different contexts. In a CMakeLists.txt file, CPACK_GENERATOR is a list of generators: and when cpack is run with no other arguments, it will iterate over that list and produce one package for each generator. In a CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE, CPACK_GENERATOR is a string naming a single generator. If you need per-cpack-generator logic to control other cpack settings, then you need a CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE.
trans-unit.target: 该 CPACK_GENERATOR 变量在不同环境下不同的含义。在 CMakeLists.txt 文件中， CPACK_GENERATOR 是生成器的列表：当不使用其他参数运行 cpack 时，它将迭代该列表并为每个生成器生成一个包。在 CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE 中， CPACK_GENERATOR 是命名单个生成器的字符串。如果需要每个cpack-generator逻辑来控制其他 cpack设置，则需要 CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE 。

trans-unit.source: The CPACK_GENERATOR variable has different meanings in different contexts. In a CMakeLists.txt file, CPACK_GENERATOR is a list of generators: and when cpack is run with no other arguments, it will iterate over that list and produce one package for each generator. In a CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE, CPACK_GENERATOR is a string naming a single generator. If you need per-cpack-generator logic to control other cpack settings, then you need a CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE. If set, the CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE is included automatically on a per-generator basis. It only need contain overrides.
trans-unit.target: 该 CPACK_GENERATOR 变量在不同环境下不同的含义。在 CMakeLists.txt 文件中， CPACK_GENERATOR 是生成器的列表：当不使用其他参数运行 cpack 时，它将循环访问该列表并为每个生成器生成一个包。在 CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE 中， CPACK_GENERATOR 是命名单个生成器的字符串。如果需要每个cpack-generator逻辑来控制其他cpack设置，则需要 CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE 。如果设置，则 CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE 会自动包含在每个发电机中。它只需要包含覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The FeatureSummary_DEFAULT_PKG_TYPE global property can be modified to change the default package type assigned when not explicitly assigned by the user.
trans-unit.target: 该 FeatureSummary_DEFAULT_PKG_TYPE 全局属性可以被修改，以改变在不被用户显式指定分配的默认封装类型。

trans-unit.source: The Variables section documents the scope of variable names and how their values are set.
trans-unit.target: 该变量部分文件变量名的范围和它们的值是如何设置的。

trans-unit.source: The install(TARGETS) and install(EXPORT) commands work together to install both targets (a library in our case) and a CMake file designed to make it easy to import the targets into another CMake project.
trans-unit.target: 在 install(TARGETS) 和 install(EXPORT) 命令共同努力，安装这两个目标（在我们的案例库），并设计成可以很容易地导入目标到另一个项目的CMake CMake的一个文件。

trans-unit.source: The File API can be used to obtain a list of build configurations from the build tree, and the IDE should present this list to the user to select a build configuration.
trans-unit.target: 的 File API 可以被用于获得从构建树构建配置的列表，和IDE应呈现这个列表的用户选择生成配置。

trans-unit.source: The cmake(1) tool allows specifying a file to use to populate the initial cache using the -C option. This can be useful to simplify commands and scripts which repeatedly require the same cache entries.
trans-unit.target: 所述 cmake(1) 工具允许指定一个文件，以用于填充使用初始高速缓存 -C 选项。这对于简化重复需要相同缓存条目的命令和脚本很有用。

trans-unit.source: The ctest(1) tool is shipped with the CMake distribution to execute provided tests and report results. The test build-target is provided to run all available tests, but the ctest(1) tool allows granular control over which tests to run, how to run them, and how to report results. Executing ctest(1) in the build directory is equivalent to running the test target:
trans-unit.target: 该 ctest(1) 工具是随CMake的分配执行提供测试和报告结果。提供了 test 构建目标来运行所有可用的测试，但是 ctest(1) 工具允许对要运行的测试，如何运行它们以及如何报告结果进行精细控制。在构建目录中执行 ctest(1) 等同于运行 test 目标：

trans-unit.source: The ctest executable will read in this file when it runs. To create a simple dashboard you can run the cmake executable or the cmake-gui to configure the project, but do not build it yet. Instead, change directory to the binary tree, and then run:
trans-unit.target: 该 ctest 在运行时可执行文件将在此文件中读取。要创建一个简单的仪表板，您可以运行 cmake 可执行文件或 cmake-gui 来配置项目，但尚未构建它。而是，将目录更改为二进制树，然后运行：

trans-unit.source: The ctest executable will build and test the project and submit the results to Kitware’s public dashboard: https://my.cdash.org/index.php?project=CMakeTutorial.
trans-unit.target: 该 ctest 可执行文件将构建和测试项目，并提交结果Kitware的公共仪表板：https://my.cdash.org/index.php?project=CMakeTutorial。

trans-unit.source: The ctest executable will build and test the project and submit the results to Kitware's public dashboard: https://my.cdash.org/index.php?project=CMakeTutorial.

The CMakePackageConfigHelpers module provides the write_basic_package_version_file() command for creating a simple package version file. This file is read by CMake when find_package() is called to determine the compatibility with the requested version, and to set some version-specific variables such as <PackageName>_VERSION, <PackageName>_VERSION_MAJOR, <PackageName>_VERSION_MINOR, etc. See cmake-packages documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CMakePackageConfigHelpers 模块提供 write_basic_package_version_file() ，用于创建一个简单的程序包版本文件命令。此文件由CMake的阅读时 find_package() 被调用，以确定与所请求的版本的相容性，并设置一些特定于版本的变量，如 <PackageName>_VERSION ， <PackageName>_VERSION_MAJOR ， <PackageName>_VERSION_MINOR 等。参见 cmake-packages 文档以获取更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The CTest module will automatically call enable_testing(), so we can remove it from our CMake files.
trans-unit.target: 该 CTest 模块会自动调用 enable_testing() ，所以我们可以从CMake的文件中删除它。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX variable can be set in the CMake cache to specify where to install the provided software. If the provided software has install rules, specified using the install() command, they will install artifacts into that prefix. On Windows, the default installation location corresponds to the ProgramFiles system directory which may be architecture specific. On Unix hosts, /usr/local is the default installation location.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 变量可以在CMake的缓存设置为指定安装提供的软件。如果提供的软件具有使用 install() 命令指定的安装规则，则它们会将工件安装到该前缀中。在Windows上，默认安装位置对应于 ProgramFiles 系统目录，该目录可能特定于体系结构。在Unix主机上， /usr/local 是默认的安装位置。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX variable always refers to the installation prefix on the target filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 变量始终是指在目标文件系统的安装前缀。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH variable may be set when invoking CMake. It is treated as a list of paths to search for Config-file Packages. A package installed in /opt/somepackage will typically install config files such as /opt/somepackage/lib/cmake/somePackage/SomePackageConfig.cmake. In that case, /opt/somepackage should be added to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH 变量可被调用的CMake当置。它被视为搜索配置文件包的路径列表。安装在 /opt/somepackage 中的软件包通常会安装配置文件，例如 /opt/somepackage/lib/cmake/somePackage/SomePackageConfig.cmake 。在这种情况下，应将 /opt/somepackage 添加到 CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH 中。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH variable provides convenience in cases where multiple prefixes need to be specified, or when multiple different package binaries are available in the same prefix. Paths to packages may also be specified by setting variables matching <PackageName>_DIR, such as SomePackage_DIR. Note that this is not a prefix but should be a full path to a directory containing a config-style package file, such as /opt/somepackage/lib/cmake/SomePackage/ in the above example.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH 变量在多个前缀需要被指定的情况下提供了便利，或当多个不同的包二进制文件在相同前缀是可用的。也可以通过设置与 <PackageName>_DIR 匹配的变量来指定包的路径，例如 SomePackage_DIR 。请注意，这不是前缀，而应是包含配置样式软件包文件的目录的完整路径，例如上例中的 /opt/somepackage/lib/cmake/SomePackage/ 。

trans-unit.source: The add_executable() command defines an executable target:
trans-unit.target: 所述 add_executable() 命令定义的可执行目标：

trans-unit.source: The build_name() command should not be called.
trans-unit.target: 该 build_name() 命令不应该叫。

trans-unit.source: The cmake_minimum_required() command does more than report an error if a too-old version of CMake is used to build a project. It also sets all policies introduced in that CMake version or earlier to NEW behavior. To manage policies without increasing the minimum required CMake version, the if(POLICY) command may be used:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用太旧的CMake版本来构建项目，则 cmake_minimum_required() 命令的作用不只是报告错误。它还会将在该CMake版本或更早版本中引入的所有策略设置为 NEW 行为。要在不增加最低要求的CMake版本的情况下管理策略，可以使用 if(POLICY) 命令：

trans-unit.source: The ctest_build() and build_command() commands no longer generate build commands for Makefile Generators with the -i option. Previously this was done to help build as much of tested projects as possible. However, this behavior is not consistent with other generators and also causes the return code of the make tool to be meaningless.
trans-unit.target: 该 ctest_build() 和 build_command() 命令不再产生构建命令的Makefile发电机用 -i 选项。以前这样做是为了帮助构建尽可能多的经过测试的项目。但是，此行为与其他生成器不一致，并且还会使 make 工具的返回代码变得毫无意义。

trans-unit.source: The enable_language() command can be used to enable languages after the project() command:
trans-unit.target: 该 enable_language() 命令可以用来启用后语言 project() 命令：

trans-unit.source: The export(EXPORT) command creates an IMPORTED targets definition file which is specific to the build-tree, and is not relocatable. This can similarly be used with a suitable package configuration file and package version file to define a package for the build tree which may be used without installation. Consumers of the build tree can simply ensure that the CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH contains the build directory, or set the ClimbingStats_DIR to <build_dir>/ClimbingStats in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 该 export(EXPORT) 命令创建一个 IMPORTED 目标定义文件是专门针对编译树，而不是重定位。可以类似地将其与合适的软件包配置文件和软件包版本文件一起使用，以定义可无需安装即可使用的构建树软件包。生成树的使用者可以简单地确保 CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH 包含生成目录，或在高速缓存中将 ClimbingStats_DIR 设置为 <build_dir>/ClimbingStats 。

trans-unit.source: The export() command generates a file containing Imported Targets, which is suitable for use from the build directory. It is not suitable for installation because it contains absolute paths to buildsystem locations, and is particular to a single build configuration.
trans-unit.target: 所述 export() 命令生成包含一个文件进口目标，其适合于从生成目录的使用。它不适合安装，因为它包含指向构建系统位置的绝对路径，并且特定于单个构建配置。

trans-unit.source: The export(PACKAGE) command does nothing by default. In some cases it is desirable to write to the user package registry, so the CMAKE_EXPORT_PACKAGE_REGISTRY variable may be set to enable it.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， export(PACKAGE) 命令不执行任何操作。在某些情况下，需要写入用户程序包注册表，因此可以将 CMAKE_EXPORT_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 变量设置为启用它。

trans-unit.source: The export(PACKAGE) command does not populate the user package registry when CMP0090 is set to NEW unless the CMAKE_EXPORT_PACKAGE_REGISTRY variable explicitly enables it. When CMP0090 is not set to NEW then export(PACKAGE) populates the user package registry unless the CMAKE_EXPORT_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY variable explicitly disables it.
trans-unit.target: 将 CMP0090 设置为 NEW 时， export(PACKAGE) 命令不会填充用户软件包注册表，除非 CMAKE_EXPORT_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 变量明确启用了它。当 CMP0090 是不设置 NEW 再 export(PACKAGE) 填充用户包注册表，除非 CMAKE_EXPORT_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 变量明确禁用它。

trans-unit.source: The export(PACKAGE) command populates the user package registry with the location of a project build tree. Build trees tend to be deleted by developers and have no "uninstall" event that could trigger removal of their entries. In order to keep the registries clean the find_package() command automatically removes stale entries it encounters if it has sufficient permissions. CMake provides no interface to remove an entry referencing an existing build tree once export(PACKAGE) has been invoked. However, if the project removes its package configuration file from the build tree then the entry referencing the location will be considered stale.

The export(PACKAGE) command populates the user package registry with the location of a project build tree. Build trees tend to be deleted by developers and have no “uninstall” event that could trigger removal of their entries. In order to keep the registries clean the find_package() command automatically removes stale entries it encounters if it has sufficient permissions. CMake provides no interface to remove an entry referencing an existing build tree once export(PACKAGE) has been invoked. However, if the project removes its package configuration file from the build tree then the entry referencing the location will be considered stale.
trans-unit.target: 该 export(PACKAGE) 命令填充与项目构建树的位置的用户包注册表。开发人员倾向于删除构建树，并且没有“卸载”事件来触发删除其条目的操作。为了保持注册表清洁，如果具有足够的权限，则 find_package() 命令会自动删除其遇到的陈旧条目。一旦调用 export(PACKAGE) , CMake不提供任何接口来删除引用现有构建树的条目。但是，如果项目从构建树中删除其程序包配置文件，则引用该位置的条目将被视为过时的。

trans-unit.source: The export(PACKAGE) command populates the user package registry with the location of a project build tree. Build trees tend to be deleted by developers and have no “uninstall” event that could trigger removal of their entries. In order to keep the registries clean the find_package() command automatically removes stale entries it encounters if it has sufficient permissions. CMake provides no interface to remove an entry referencing an existing build tree once export(PACKAGE) has been invoked. However, if the project removes its package configuration file from the build tree then the entry referencing the location will be considered stale.
trans-unit.target: 该 export(PACKAGE) 命令填充与项目构建树的位置的用户包注册表。开发人员倾向于删除构建树，并且没有“卸载”事件，该事件可能触发删除其条目。为了保持注册表清洁，如果具有足够的权限，则 find_package() 命令会自动删除其遇到的陈旧条目。一旦调用 export(PACKAGE) , CMake不提供任何接口来删除引用现有构建树的条目。但是，如果项目从构建树中删除其程序包配置文件，则引用该位置的条目将被视为过时的。

trans-unit.source: The export_library_dependencies() command should not be called.
trans-unit.target: 该 export_library_dependencies() 命令不应该叫。

trans-unit.source: The find_package() command searches the two package registries as two of the search steps specified in its documentation. If it has sufficient permissions it also removes stale package registry entries that refer to directories that do not exist or do not contain a matching package configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 所述 find_package() 命令搜索所述两个包登记为它的两个文档中指定的搜索步骤。如果它具有足够的权限，它还将删除引用不存在的目录或不包含匹配的软件包配置文件的目录的陈旧软件包注册表项。

trans-unit.source: The find_package() command may be used to search for the package configuration file. This command constructs a set of installation prefixes and searches under each prefix in several locations. Given the name Foo, it looks for a file called FooConfig.cmake or foo-config.cmake. The full set of locations is specified in the find_package() command documentation. One place it looks is:
trans-unit.target: 所述 find_package() 命令可以被用来搜索包配置文件。此命令构造了一组安装前缀，并在多个位置的每个前缀下进行搜索。给定名称 Foo ，它将查找名为 FooConfig.cmake 或 foo-config.cmake 的文件。完整的位置集在 find_package() 命令文档中指定。它看起来的一个地方是：

trans-unit.source: The foreach()/endforeach() and while()/endwhile() commands delimit code blocks to be executed in a loop. Inside such blocks the break() command may be used to terminate the loop early whereas the continue() command may be used to start with the next iteration immediately.
trans-unit.target: 所述 foreach() / endforeach() 和 while() / endwhile() 命令划码块以在一个循环中被执行。在此类块内， break() 命令可用于提前终止循环，而 continue() 命令可用于立即开始下一次迭代。

trans-unit.source: The if() command has a special condition syntax that allows for variable references in the short form <variable> instead of ${<variable>}. However, environment and cache variables always need to be referenced as $ENV{<variable>} or $CACHE{<variable>}.
trans-unit.target: 在 if() 命令有一个特殊条件的语法，其允许在短形式变量引用 <variable> 代替 ${<variable>} 。但是，环境和缓存变量始终需要引用为 $ENV{<variable>} 或 $CACHE{<variable>} 。

trans-unit.source: The if()/elseif()/else()/endif() commands delimit code blocks to be executed conditionally.
trans-unit.target: 在 if() / elseif() / else() / endif() 命令划码块被有条件地执行。

trans-unit.source: The install(EXPORT) generates and installs files which contain Imported Targets. These files are generated with relative paths (unless the user specifies absolute paths), and are designed for multi-configuration use. See Creating Packages for more.
trans-unit.target: 在 install(EXPORT) 生成并安装文件包含导入目标。这些文件是用相对路径生成的（除非用户指定绝对路径），并且设计用于多种配置。有关更多信息，请参见创建软件包。

trans-unit.source: The load_command() command should not be called.
trans-unit.target: 该 load_command() 命令不应该叫。

trans-unit.source: The macro()/endmacro(), and function()/endfunction() commands delimit code blocks to be recorded for later invocation as commands.
trans-unit.target: 的 macro() / endmacro() ，和 function() / endfunction() 命令划码块被记录供以后调用作为命令。

trans-unit.source: The mark_as_advanced() command no longer creates a cache entry if one does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 该 mark_as_advanced() 命令不再产生，如果不存在缓存条目。

trans-unit.source: The message() command joins the strings from this list and for log levels of NOTICE and below, it prepends the resultant string to each line of the message.
trans-unit.target: 的 message() 命令从该列表中和的日志级别加入串 NOTICE 和下方，它预先将所得的串到消息的每一行。

trans-unit.source: The message() command will only output messages of the specified log level or higher. The default log level is STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 的 message() 命令将只指定的日志级别的输出消息或更高。默认日志级别为 STATUS 。

trans-unit.source: The option() command is typically used to create a cache entry to allow users to set the option. However, there are cases in which a normal (non-cached) variable of the same name as the option may be defined by the project prior to calling the option() command. For example, a project that embeds another project as a subdirectory may want to hard-code options of the subproject to build the way it needs.
trans-unit.target: 该 option() 命令通常用来创建缓存条目，从而允许用户设置的选项。但是，在某些情况下，项目可能会在调用 option() 命令之前由项目定义与该选项同名的普通（非缓存）变量。例如，将另一个项目嵌入为子目录的项目可能希望对子项目的选项进行硬编码，以构建其所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: The output_required_files() command should not be called.
trans-unit.target: 该 output_required_files() 命令不应该叫。

trans-unit.source: The project() command manages VERSION variables.
trans-unit.target: 该 project() 命令管理 VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: The project() command preserves leading zeros in version components.
trans-unit.target: 该 project() 命令蜜饯领先版组件零。

trans-unit.source: The subdir_depends() command should not be called.
trans-unit.target: 该 subdir_depends() 命令不应该叫。

trans-unit.source: The subdirs() command does not process its arguments until after the calling directory is fully processed. Therefore looking up this property in the current directory will not see them.
trans-unit.target: 只有在完全处理了调用目录之后， subdirs() 命令才会处理其参数。因此，在当前目录中查找此属性将看不到它们。

trans-unit.source: The target_include_directories(), target_compile_definitions() and target_compile_options() commands specify the build specifications and the usage requirements of binary targets. The commands populate the INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES, COMPILE_DEFINITIONS and COMPILE_OPTIONS target properties respectively, and/or the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES, INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS and INTERFACE_COMPILE_OPTIONS target properties.
trans-unit.target: 该 target_include_directories() ， target_compile_definitions() 和 target_compile_options() 命令指定生成规范和二元目标的使用需求。这些命令分别填充 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ， COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 和 COMPILE_OPTIONS 目标属性，和/或 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ， INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 和 INTERFACE_COMPILE_OPTIONS 目标属性。

trans-unit.source: The target_include_directories(), target_compile_definitions() and target_compile_options() commands have an effect on only one target at a time. The commands add_compile_definitions(), add_compile_options() and include_directories() have a similar function, but operate at directory scope instead of target scope for convenience.
trans-unit.target: 所述 target_include_directories() ， target_compile_definitions() 和 target_compile_options() 命令具有在一个时间仅在一个目标的效果。命令 add_compile_definitions() ， add_compile_options() 和 include_directories() 具有类似的功能，但为方便起见，它们在目录范围而不是目标范围内运行。

trans-unit.source: The target_sources() command converts relative paths to absolute.
trans-unit.target: 所述 target_sources() 命令相对路径转换为绝对的。

trans-unit.source: The try_compile() command source-file signature generates a CMakeLists.txt file to build the source file into an executable. In order to compile the source the same way as it might be compiled by the calling project, the generated project sets the value of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS variable to that in the calling project. The value of the CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS variable may be needed in some cases too, but CMake 3.1 and lower did not set it in the generated project. CMake 3.2 and above prefer to set it so that linker flags are honored as well as compiler flags. This policy provides compatibility with the pre-3.2 behavior.
trans-unit.target: 所述 try_compile() 命令的源文件签名生成 CMakeLists.txt 文件到源文件构建成可执行。为了以与调用项目可能相同的方式编译源，生成的项目将 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS 变量的值设置为调用项目中的值。在某些情况下，也可能需要 CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS 变量的值，但是CMake 3.1及更低版本没有在生成的项目中设置它。 CMake 3.2及更高版本更喜欢对其进行设置，以使链接器标志和编译器标志均受尊重。此策略提供了与3.2之前的行为的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: The try_compile() source file signature is intended to allow callers to check whether they will be able to compile a given source file with the current toolchain. In order to match compiler behavior, any language standard mode should match. However, CMake 3.7 and below did not do this. CMake 3.8 and above prefer to honor the language standard settings for C, CXX (C++), and CUDA using the values of the variables:
trans-unit.target: 该 try_compile() 的源文件的签名是为了让呼叫者以检查它们是否能够编译一个给定的源文件与当前的工具链。为了匹配编译器行为，任何语言标准模式都应匹配。但是，CMake 3.7和更低版本没有执行此操作。CMake 3.8及更高版本更喜欢使用变量的值来遵守 C ， CXX （C ++）和 CUDA 的语言标准设置：

trans-unit.source: The use_mangled_mesa() command should not be called.
trans-unit.target: 该 use_mangled_mesa() 命令不应该叫。

trans-unit.source: The utility_source() command should not be called.
trans-unit.target: 该 utility_source() 命令不应该叫。

trans-unit.source: The variable_requires() command should not be called.
trans-unit.target: 该 variable_requires() 命令不应该叫。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_BUILD_PARALLEL_LEVEL environment variable, if set, specifies a default parallel level when this option is not given.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_BUILD_PARALLEL_LEVEL 环境变量，如果设置，指定当未给出此选项默认并行水平。

trans-unit.source: The Makefile Generators set this to make, gmake, or a generator-specific tool (e.g. nmake for NMake Makefiles).
trans-unit.target: 在Makefile文件生成器将其设置为 make ， gmake ，或发电机特有的工具（如 nmake 为 NMake Makefiles ）。

trans-unit.source: The Makefile Generators set this to make, gmake, or a generator-specific tool (e.g. nmake for NMake Makefiles).
trans-unit.target: 在Makefile文件生成器将其设置为 make ， gmake ，或发电机特有的工具（如 nmake 为 NMake Makefiles ）。

trans-unit.source: The Makefile Generators set this to make, gmake, or a generator-specific tool (e.g. nmake for NMake Makefiles).
The Makefile Generators will remove BYPRODUCTS and other GENERATED files during make clean.
trans-unit.target: 该Makefile文件生成器将去除 BYPRODUCTS 和其他 GENERATED 在文件 make clean 。

trans-unit.source: The Makefile Generators will remove GENERATED files during make clean.
trans-unit.target: 该Makefile文件生成器将删除 GENERATED 在文件 make clean 。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio Generators create a .sln file for each directory whose CMakeLists.txt file calls the project() command. Set this property in the same directory as a project() command call (e.g. in the top-level CMakeLists.txt file) to specify the default startup project for the corresponding solution file.
trans-unit.target: 在Visual Studio中生成器创建 .sln 每个其目录文件 CMakeLists.txt 文件调用 project() 命令。将此属性设置为与 project() 命令调用相同的目录（例如，在顶级 CMakeLists.txt 文件中），以为相应的解决方案文件指定默认的启动项目。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio Generators for VS 2010 and above support using a CUDA toolset provided by a CUDA Toolkit. The toolset version number may be specified by a field in CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET of the form cuda=8.0. If none is specified CMake will choose a default version. CMake provides the selected CUDA toolset version in this variable. The value may be empty if no CUDA Toolkit with Visual Studio integration is installed.
trans-unit.target: VS 2010及更高版本的Visual Studio Generators支持使用CUDA工具包提供的CUDA工具集。工具集版本号可以由 CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET 中的字段以 cuda=8.0 的形式指定。如果未指定，则CMake将选择默认版本。 CMake在此变量中提供了选定的CUDA工具集版本。如果未安装与Visual Studio集成的CUDA工具包，则该值可能为空。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio Generators for VS 2010 and above support using a CUDA toolset provided by a CUDA Toolkit. The toolset version number may be specified by a field in CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET of the form cuda=8.0. Or it is automatically detected if a path to a standalone CUDA directory is specified in the form cuda=C:\path\to\cuda. If none is specified CMake will choose a default version. CMake provides the selected CUDA toolset version in this variable. The value may be empty if no CUDA Toolkit with Visual Studio integration is installed.
trans-unit.target: VS 2010及更高版本的Visual Studio Generators支持使用CUDA工具包提供的CUDA工具集。工具集版本号可以由 CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET 中的字段以 cuda=8.0 的形式指定。或自动检测是否以 cuda=C:\path\to\cuda 形式指定了独立CUDA目录的路径。如果未指定，则CMake将选择默认版本。CMake在此变量中提供了选定的CUDA工具集版本。如果未安装与Visual Studio集成的CUDA工具包，则该值可能为空。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio Generators for VS 2010 and above support using a standalone (non-installed) NVIDIA CUDA toolkit. The path may be specified by a field in CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET of the form cuda=C:\path\to\cuda. The given directory must at least contain a folder .\nvcc and must provide Visual Studio integration files in path .\CUDAVisualStudioIntegration\extras\ visual_studio_integration\MSBuildExtensions\. One can create a standalone CUDA toolkit directory by either opening a installer with 7zip or copying the files that are extracted by the running installer. The value may be empty if no path to a standalone CUDA Toolkit was specified.
trans-unit.target: VS 2010及更高版本的Visual Studio Generators支持使用独立的（未安装的）NVIDIA CUDA工具包。路径可以由 CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET 中的字段指定，格式为 cuda=C:\path\to\cuda 。给定目录必须至少包含一个文件夹 .\nvcc 并且必须在路径 .\CUDAVisualStudioIntegration\extras\ visual_studio_integration\MSBuildExtensions\ 提供Visual Studio集成文件。可以通过使用7zip打开安装程序或复制正在运行的安装程序提取的文件来创建独立的CUDA工具包目录。如果未指定独立CUDA工具包的路径，则该值可能为空。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio Generators for VS 2013 and above support using either the 32-bit or 64-bit host toolchains by specifying a host=x86 or host=x64 value in the CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET option. CMake provides the selected toolchain architecture preference in this variable (x86, x64, or empty).
trans-unit.target: VS 2013及更高版本的Visual Studio生成器通过在 CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET 选项中指定 host=x86 或 host=x64 值来支持使用32位或64位宿主工具链。 CMake在此变量（ x86 ， x64 或empty）中提供了选定的工具链体系结构首选项。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio Generators for VS 2017 and above allow to select minor versions of the same toolset. The toolset version number may be specified by a field in CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET of the form version=14.11. If none is specified CMake will choose a default toolset. The value may be empty if no minor version was selected and the default is used.
trans-unit.target: VS 2017及更高版本的Visual Studio生成器允许选择同一工具集的次要版本。工具集版本号可以由 CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET 中的一个字段指定，格式为 version=14.11 。如果未指定，则CMake将选择默认工具集。如果未选择次要版本并且使用默认值，则该值可能为空。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio Generators set this to the full path to MSBuild.exe (VS >= 10), devenv.com (VS 7,8,9), or VCExpress.exe (VS Express 8,9). (See also variables CMAKE_VS_MSBUILD_COMMAND and CMAKE_VS_DEVENV_COMMAND.
trans-unit.target: 在Visual Studio中发生器将此设置为完整的路径 MSBuild.exe （VS> = 10）， devenv.com （VS 7,8,9），或 VCExpress.exe （VS快递8,9）。（另请参见变量 CMAKE_VS_MSBUILD_COMMAND 和 CMAKE_VS_DEVENV_COMMAND 。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio Generators support toolset specification using one of these forms:
trans-unit.target: 在Visual Studio中生成器支持使用这些形式的一个工具集规格：

trans-unit.source: The CMakePackageConfigHelpers module provides a macro for creating a simple ConfigVersion.cmake file. This file sets the version of the package. It is read by CMake when find_package() is called to determine the compatibility with the requested version, and to set some version-specific variables <PackageName>_VERSION, <PackageName>_VERSION_MAJOR, <PackageName>_VERSION_MINOR etc. The install(EXPORT) command is used to export the targets in the ClimbingStatsTargets export-set, defined previously by the install(TARGETS) command. This command generates the ClimbingStatsTargets.cmake file to contain IMPORTED targets, suitable for use by downstreams and arranges to install it to lib/cmake/ClimbingStats. The generated ClimbingStatsConfigVersion.cmake and a cmake/ClimbingStatsConfig.cmake are installed to the same location, completing the package.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMakePackageConfigHelpers 模块提供了创建一个简单的宏 ConfigVersion.cmake 文件。该文件设置软件包的版本。当 find_package() 以确定与请求版本的兼容性，并设置某些特定于版本的变量 <PackageName>_VERSION ， <PackageName>_VERSION_MAJOR ， <PackageName>_VERSION_MINOR 等时，CMake会读取该文件。install install(EXPORT) 命令用于导出 ClimbingStatsTargets 导出集中的目标，该导出集中先前由 install(TARGETS) 命令定义。此命令生成 ClimbingStatsTargets.cmake 该文件包含 IMPORTED 目标，适合下游使用，并安排将其安装到 lib/cmake/ClimbingStats 。生成的 ClimbingStatsConfigVersion.cmake 和 cmake/ClimbingStatsConfig.cmake 安装在同一位置，从而完成了软件包。

trans-unit.source: The Documentation module is removed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Documentation 模块被移除。

trans-unit.source: The Documentation was added as a support mechanism for the VTK project and was tuned for that project. Instead of CMake providing this module with (now old) VTK patterns for cache variables and required packages, the module is now deprecated by CMake itself.
trans-unit.target: 该 Documentation 被添加为VTK项目的支持机制，并针对该项目进行了调整。现在，CMake本身已弃用该模块，而不是CMake为该模块提供用于缓存变量和所需软件包的（现在是旧的）VTK模式。

trans-unit.source: The ExternalProject_Add()STEP_TARGETS option, and the ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() function, can be used to create build targets for individual steps of an external project.
trans-unit.target: 该 ExternalProject_Add() STEP_TARGETS 选项，并且 ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() 函数，可用于创建一个外部项目的各个步骤构建目标。

trans-unit.source: The FindOpenGL module provides an OpenGL::GL target and an OPENGL_LIBRARIES variable for projects to use for legacy GL interfaces. When both a legacy GL library (e.g. libGL.so) and GLVND libraries for OpenGL and GLX (e.g. libOpenGL.so and libGLX.so) are available, the module must choose between them. It documents an OpenGL_GL_PREFERENCE variable that can be used to specify an explicit preference. When no such preference is set, the module must choose a default preference.
trans-unit.target: 该 FindOpenGL 模块提供了 OpenGL::GL 目标和 OPENGL_LIBRARIES 的项目使用了传统的GL接口变量。当用于OpenGL和GLX 的旧版GL库（例如 libGL.so ）和GLVND库（例如 libOpenGL.so 和 libGLX.so ）都可用时，模块必须在它们之间进行选择。它记录了 OpenGL_GL_PREFERENCE 变量，该变量可用于指定显式首选项。如果未设置此类首选项，则模块必须选择默认首选项。

trans-unit.source: The FindQt module does not exist for find_package().
trans-unit.target: 该 FindQt 模块不存在 find_package() 。

trans-unit.source: The WriteCompilerDetectionHeader module is removed.

The CMAKE_C_KNOWN_FEATURES and CMAKE_CXX_KNOWN_FEATURES global properties contain all the features known to CMake, regardless of compiler support for the feature. The CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES and CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES variables contain all features CMake knows are known to the compiler, regardless of language standard or compile flags needed to use them.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_C_KNOWN_FEATURES 和 CMAKE_CXX_KNOWN_FEATURES 全局属性包含所有特性已知的CMake，无论对于功能编译器支持。该 CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES 和 CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES 变量包含所有功能的CMake知道是众所周知的编译器，无论语言标准，或者使用它们所需的编译标志。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_C_KNOWN_FEATURES, CMAKE_CUDA_KNOWN_FEATURES, and CMAKE_CXX_KNOWN_FEATURES global properties contain all the features known to CMake, regardless of compiler support for the feature. The CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES, CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILE_FEATURES , and CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES variables contain all features CMake knows are known to the compiler, regardless of language standard or compile flags needed to use them.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_C_KNOWN_FEATURES ， CMAKE_CUDA_KNOWN_FEATURES 和 CMAKE_CXX_KNOWN_FEATURES 全局属性包含所有已知的功能，CMake的，不管编译器支持的功能。该 CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES ， CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILE_FEATURES 和 CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES 变量包含所有功能的CMake知道是众所周知的编译器，无论语言标准，或者使用它们所需的编译标志。

trans-unit.source: The ENABLED_LANGUAGES global property contains the languages which are currently enabled.
trans-unit.target: 该 ENABLED_LANGUAGES 全局属性包含当前启用的语言。

trans-unit.source: The GENERATED source file property is now visible in all directories.
The GENERATED source file property may be globally visible. See its documentation for details.

The LANGUAGE source file property is documented to mean that the source file is written in the specified language. In CMake 3.19 and below, setting this property causes CMake to compile the source file using the compiler for the specified language. However, it only passes an explicit flag to tell the compiler to treat the source as the specified language for MSVC-like, XL, and Embarcadero compilers for the CXX language. CMake 3.20 and above prefer to also explicitly tell the compiler to use the specified language using a flag such as -x c on all compilers for which such flags are known.
The RESOURCE_GROUPS property of tests, which describes the resources required by the test.
trans-unit.target: 测试的 RESOURCE_GROUPS 属性，描述了测试所需的资源。

trans-unit.source: The ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY and ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_NAME target properties may be used to control archive output artifact locations and names in the build tree.
trans-unit.target: 该 ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY 和 ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_NAME 目标属性可用于控制在构建树归档输出影位置和名称。

trans-unit.source: The AUTOMOC target property controls whether cmake(1) inspects the C++ files in the target to determine if they require moc to be run, and to create rules to execute moc at the appropriate time.
trans-unit.target: 所述 AUTOMOC 目标属性控制是否 cmake(1) 检查目标中的C ++文件，以确定它们是否需要 moc 来运行，并创建规则来执行 moc 在适当的时间。

trans-unit.source: The AUTOMOC target property may be pre-set for all following targets by setting the CMAKE_AUTOMOC variable. The AUTOMOC_MOC_OPTIONS target property may be populated to set options to pass to moc. The CMAKE_AUTOMOC_MOC_OPTIONS variable may be populated to pre-set the options for all following targets.
trans-unit.target: 该 AUTOMOC 目标属性可以通过设置对所有以下目标预先设定 CMAKE_AUTOMOC 变量。该 AUTOMOC_MOC_OPTIONS 目标属性可被填充设置选项传递给 moc 。该 CMAKE_AUTOMOC_MOC_OPTIONS 变量可被填充到预先设定的所有以下目标的选项。

trans-unit.source: The AUTORCC target property controls whether cmake(1) creates rules to execute rcc at the appropriate time on source files which have the suffix .qrc.
trans-unit.target: 所述 AUTORCC 目标属性控制是否 cmake(1) 创建的规则来执行 rcc 在适当的时间在其上具有后缀源文件 .qrc 。

trans-unit.source: The AUTORCC target property may be pre-set for all following targets by setting the CMAKE_AUTORCC variable. The AUTORCC_OPTIONS target property may be populated to set options to pass to rcc. The CMAKE_AUTORCC_OPTIONS variable may be populated to pre-set the options for all following targets. The AUTORCC_OPTIONS source file property may be set on the <name>.qrc file to set particular options for the file. This overrides options from the AUTORCC_OPTIONS target property.
trans-unit.target: 该 AUTORCC 目标属性可以通过设置对所有以下目标预先设定 CMAKE_AUTORCC 变量。该 AUTORCC_OPTIONS 目标属性可被填充设置选项传递给 rcc 。该 CMAKE_AUTORCC_OPTIONS 变量可被填充到预先设定的所有以下目标的选项。所述 AUTORCC_OPTIONS 源文件属性可以在被设置 <name>.qrc 文件设置为文件特定的选项。这将覆盖来自 AUTORCC_OPTIONS 目标属性的选项。

trans-unit.source: The AUTOUIC target property controls whether cmake(1) inspects the C++ files in the target to determine if they require uic to be run, and to create rules to execute uic at the appropriate time.
trans-unit.target: 所述 AUTOUIC 目标属性控制是否 cmake(1) 检查目标中的C ++文件，以确定它们是否需要 uic 要运行，并创建规则执行 uic 在适当的时间。

trans-unit.source: The AUTOUIC target property may be pre-set for all following targets by setting the CMAKE_AUTOUIC variable. The AUTOUIC_OPTIONS target property may be populated to set options to pass to uic. The CMAKE_AUTOUIC_OPTIONS variable may be populated to pre-set the options for all following targets. The AUTOUIC_OPTIONS source file property may be set on the <basename>.ui file to set particular options for the file. This overrides options from the AUTOUIC_OPTIONS target property.
trans-unit.target: 该 AUTOUIC 目标属性可以通过设置对所有以下目标预先设定 CMAKE_AUTOUIC 变量。该 AUTOUIC_OPTIONS 目标属性可被填充设置选项传递给 uic 。该 CMAKE_AUTOUIC_OPTIONS 变量可被填充到预先设定的所有以下目标的选项。所述 AUTOUIC_OPTIONS 源文件属性可以在被设置 <basename>.ui 文件为文件组特定选项。这将覆盖来自 AUTOUIC_OPTIONS 目标属性的选项。

trans-unit.source: The COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_NUMBER_MAX target property specifies that content will be evaluated numerically and the maximum number among all specified will be calculated:
trans-unit.target: 所述 COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_NUMBER_MAX 目标属性指定的内容将被进行数值计算和所有指定中的最大数目将被计算：

trans-unit.source: The LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY and LIBRARY_OUTPUT_NAME target properties may be used to control library output artifact locations and names in the build tree.
trans-unit.target: 该 LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY 和 LIBRARY_OUTPUT_NAME 目标属性可用于控制在构建树库输出影位置和名称。

trans-unit.source: The LOCATION may also be read from an IMPORTED target, though there is rarely reason to do so. Commands such as add_custom_command() can transparently use an IMPORTEDEXECUTABLE target as a COMMAND executable.
trans-unit.target: 该 LOCATION 也可以从导入的目标看，虽然有很少的理由这样做。命令，诸如 add_custom_command() 可以透明地使用一个 IMPORTED EXECUTABLE 靶材作为 COMMAND 可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: The RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY and RUNTIME_OUTPUT_NAME target properties may be used to control runtime output artifact locations and names in the build tree.
trans-unit.target: 的 RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY 和 RUNTIME_OUTPUT_NAME 目标属性可被用于在构建树控制运行输出伪影位置和名称。

trans-unit.source: The BUILD_SHARED_LIBS variable may be enabled to change the behavior of add_library() to build shared libraries by default.
trans-unit.target: 所述 BUILD_SHARED_LIBS 变量可以被使能以改变的行为 add_library() 由缺省建立共享库。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_APPLE_SILICON_PROCESSOR normal variable, if set, overrides this environment variable.
The CMAKE_DIRECTORY_LABELS variable can be used to initialize this property.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_DIRECTORY_LABELS 变量可以用来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM tells the generator which SDK to use. Further CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION tells the generator what version of Windows CE to use. Currently version 8.0 (Windows Embedded Compact 2013) is supported out of the box. Other versions may require one to set CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET to the correct value.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM 告诉该SDK来使用发电机。进一步的 CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION 告诉生成器使用什么版本的Windows CE。当前支持开箱即用的版本8.0（Windows Embedded Compact 2013）。其他版本可能需要将 CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET 设置为正确的值。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET may be set to select the Nsight Tegra "Toolchain Version" value.
The CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET may be set to select the Nsight Tegra “Toolchain Version” value.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET 可以设置为选择Nsight Tegra的“工具链版本”值。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED_VERSION variable may also be used to determine whether to report an error on use of deprecated macros or functions.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED_VERSION 变量也可以被用来确定是否对使用弃用宏或功能的报告一个错误。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_STAGING_PREFIX is also optional. It may be used to specify a path on the host to install to. The CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX is always the runtime installation location, even when cross-compiling.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_STAGING_PREFIX 也是可选的。它可用于指定主机上要安装的路径。该 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 始终是运行时安装位置，即使在交叉编译。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_SYSROOT is optional, and may be specified if a sysroot is available.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_SYSROOT 是可选的，如果SYSROOT可用可指定。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_SYSROOT variable can also be used to specify exactly one directory to use as a prefix. Setting CMAKE_SYSROOT also has other effects. See the documentation for that variable for more.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_SYSROOT 变量也可以用来精确地指定一个目录作为前缀使用。设置 CMAKE_SYSROOT 也具有其他效果。有关更多信息，请参见该变量的文档。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME is the CMake-identifier of the target platform to build for.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 是目标平台的CMake的标识符来构建。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR is the CMake-identifier of the target architecture to build for.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR 是目标架构的CMake的标识符来建立。

trans-unit.source: The CTEST_BUILD_COMMAND variable may be set to explicitly specify the build command line. Otherwise the build command line is computed automatically based on the options given.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 CTEST_BUILD_COMMAND 变量设置为显式指定构建命令行。否则，将根据给定的选项自动计算构建命令行。

trans-unit.source: The cmake-commands(7) manual entry for <cmd> is printed in a human-readable text format. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: <cmd> 的 cmake-commands(7) 手动输入以人类可读的文本格式打印。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The cmake-commands(7) manual is printed in a human-readable text format. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: 所述 cmake-commands(7) 手册打印在人类可读的文本格式。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The cmake-env-variables(7) manual documents environment variables that have special meaning to CMake.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmake-env-variables(7) 有特殊含义向CMake手动文件的环境变量。

trans-unit.source: The cmake-modules(7) manual entry for <mod> is printed in a human-readable text format. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: <mod> 的 cmake-modules(7) 手动输入以人类可读的文本格式打印。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The cmake-modules(7) manual is printed in a human-readable text format. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: 所述 cmake-modules(7) 手册打印在人类可读的文本格式。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The cmake-policies(7) manual entry for <cmp> is printed in a human-readable text format. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: <cmp> 的 cmake-policies(7) 手动输入以人类可读的文本格式打印。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The cmake-policies(7) manual is printed in a human-readable text format. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: 所述 cmake-policies(7) 手册打印在人类可读的文本格式。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The cmake-properties(7) manual entries for <prop> are printed in a human-readable text format. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: <prop> 的 cmake-properties(7) 手动条目以人类可读的文本格式打印。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The cmake-properties(7) manual is printed in a human-readable text format. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: 所述 cmake-properties(7) 手册打印在人类可读的文本格式。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The cmake-variables(7) manual documents the many variables that are provided by CMake or have meaning to CMake when set by project code.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmake-variables(7) 手动文件由CMake的提供或项目代码集时都意味着向CMake了很多变数。

trans-unit.source: The cmake-variables(7) manual entry for <var> is printed in a human-readable text format. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: <var> 的 cmake-variables(7) 手动输入以人类可读的文本格式打印。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The cmake-variables(7) manual is printed in a human-readable text format. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_SYSTEM_PREFIX_PATH is initialized on the first call to a project() or enable_language() command. Therefore one must set CMAKE_FIND_NO_INSTALL_PREFIX before this in order to take effect. A user may set the variable as a cache entry on the command line to achieve this.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_SYSTEM_PREFIX_PATH 是在第一次调用一个初始化的 project() 或 enable_language() 命令。因此，必须先设置 CMAKE_FIND_NO_INSTALL_PREFIX 才能生效。用户可以在命令行上将变量设置为缓存条目以实现此目的。

trans-unit.source: The PRE_INSTALL_SCRIPT and POST_INSTALL_SCRIPT properties are the old way to specify CMake scripts to run before and after installing a target. They are used only when the old INSTALL_TARGETS command is used to install the target. Use the install() command instead.

trans-unit.source: The target_link_libraries() command should be preferred whenever possible. Library dependencies are chained automatically, so directory-wide specification of link libraries is rarely needed.
trans-unit.target: 应尽可能使用 target_link_libraries() 命令。库依赖关系是自动链接的，因此很少需要目录范围的链接库规范。

trans-unit.source: The UNITY_BUILD_CODE_BEFORE_INCLUDE and UNITY_BUILD_CODE_AFTER_INCLUDE target properties can be used to inject code into the unity source files before and after every #include statement.
trans-unit.target: 该 UNITY_BUILD_CODE_BEFORE_INCLUDE 和 UNITY_BUILD_CODE_AFTER_INCLUDE 目标性能，可用于将代码注入统一的源文件之前和之后每次 #include 声明。

trans-unit.source: The <LANG>_VISIBILITY_PRESET and VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN target properties affect visibility of symbols during dynamic linking. When first introduced these properties affected compilation of sources only in shared libraries, module libraries, and executables with the ENABLE_EXPORTS property set. This was sufficient for the basic use cases of shared libraries and executables with plugins. However, some sources may be compiled as part of static libraries or object libraries and then linked into a shared library later. CMake 3.3 and above prefer to honor these properties for sources compiled in all target types. This policy preserves compatibility for projects expecting the properties to work only for some target types.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <LANG>_VISIBILITY_PRESET 和 VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN 目标属性动态链接过程影响符号的可见性。首次引入这些属性时，只会影响共享库，模块库和设置了 ENABLE_EXPORTS 属性的可执行文件中的源代码编译。对于共享库和带有插件的可执行文件的基本用例而言，这已足够。但是，某些源可以作为静态库或对象库的一部分进行编译，然后在以后链接到共享库中。对于所有目标类型中编译的源，CMake 3.3及更高版本更喜欢使用这些属性。此策略保留了对希望属性仅对某些目标类型起作用的项目的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: The <LANG>_VISIBILITY_PRESET property determines the value passed in a visibility related compile option, such as -fvisibility= for <LANG>. This property affects compilation in sources of all types of targets (subject to policy CMP0063).
trans-unit.target: 所述 <LANG>_VISIBILITY_PRESET 属性决定相关编译选项能见度，如传递的值 -fvisibility= 用于 <LANG> 。此属性影响所有类型目标的源中的编译（取决于策略 CMP0063 ）。

trans-unit.target: 所述 <ORIGIN>_autogen 目标

trans-unit.source: The <PRIVATE|PUBLIC|INTERFACE> keyword to use for internal target_link_libraries() calls. The default is to use no keyword which uses the old "plain" form of target_link_libraries(). Note that is matters because whatever is used inside the FindCUDA module must also be used outside - the two forms of target_link_libraries() cannot be mixed.
The <PackageName>
trans-unit.target: 所述 <PackageName>

trans-unit.source: The <PackageName> which is searched for
trans-unit.target: 所述 <PackageName> 其被搜索

trans-unit.source: The <PackageName>_FOUND variable will be set to TRUE if all the variables <required-var>... are valid and any optional constraints are satisfied, and FALSE otherwise. A success or failure message may be displayed based on the results and on whether the REQUIRED and/or QUIET option was given to the find_package() call.
trans-unit.target: 在 <PackageName>_FOUND 变量将被设置为 TRUE ，如果所有的变量 <required-var>... 是有效的，任何可选约束满足， FALSE 反之。根据结果​​以及是否对 find_package() 调用指定了 REQUIRED 和/或 QUIET 选项，可能会显示成功或失败消息。

trans-unit.source: The <PackageName>_FOUND variable will be set to TRUE if all the variables <required-var>... are valid and any optional constraints are satisfied, and FALSE otherwise. A success or failure message may be displayed based on the results and on whether the REQUIRED and/or QUIET option was given to the find_package() call.
trans-unit.target: 在 <PackageName>_FOUND 变量将被设置为 TRUE ，如果所有的变量 <required-var>... 是有效的，任何可选约束满足， FALSE 反之。根据结果​​以及是否对 find_package() 调用指定了 REQUIRED 和/或 QUIET 选项，可能会显示成功或失败消息。

trans-unit.source: The <PackageName>_ROOT variable is also searched as a prefix for find_package() calls using module-file packages such as FindSomePackage.
trans-unit.target: 还使用模块文件包（如 FindSomePackage find_package() 将 <PackageName>_ROOT 变量作为find_package（）调用的前缀进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: The <condition> has the same syntax and is evaluated using the same logic as described at length for the if() command.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <condition> 具有相同的语法和长度在对于所描述的是使用相同的逻辑评估 if() 命令。

trans-unit.source: The <contentOptions> can be any of the download or update/patch options that the ExternalProject_Add() command understands. The configure, build, install and test steps are explicitly disabled and therefore options related to them will be ignored. In most cases, <contentOptions> will just be a couple of options defining the download method and method-specific details like a commit tag or archive hash. For example:
trans-unit.target: 所述 <contentOptions> 可以是任何的下载或更新/补丁选项，所述的 ExternalProject_Add() 命令理解。配置，构建，安装和测试步骤被明确禁用，因此与它们相关的选项将被忽略。在大多数情况下， <contentOptions> 只是几个选项，用于定义下载方法和方法特定的详细信息，例如提交标记或存档哈希。例如：

trans-unit.source: The <contentOptions> can be any of the download or update/patch options that the ExternalProject_Add() command understands. The configure, build, install and test steps are explicitly disabled and therefore options related to them will be ignored. The SOURCE_SUBDIR option is an exception, see FetchContent_MakeAvailable() for details on how that affects behavior.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <contentOptions> 可以是任何的下载或更新/补丁选项，所述的 ExternalProject_Add() 命令理解。配置，构建，安装和测试步骤被明确禁用，因此与它们相关的选项将被忽略。该 SOURCE_SUBDIR 选项是一个例外，见 FetchContent_MakeAvailable() 有关如何影响行为的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The <docstring> must be specified as a line of text providing a quick summary of the option for presentation to cmake-gui(1) users.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <docstring> 必须被指定为提供所述选项的快速摘要以呈现给一行文本 cmake-gui(1) 的用户。

trans-unit.source: The <input> and <output> arguments are the input and output file, the same way as in configure_file().
trans-unit.target: 所述 <input> 和 <output> 参数是输入和输出文件，以相同的方式如在 configure_file() 。

trans-unit.source: The <lcName>_SOURCE_DIR and <lcName>_BINARY_DIR variables are still returned to the caller, but since these locations are not stored as global properties when this form is used, they are only available to the calling scope and below rather than the entire project hierarchy. No <lcName>_POPULATED variable is set in the caller’s scope with this form.
trans-unit.target: 该 <lcName>_SOURCE_DIR 和 <lcName>_BINARY_DIR 变量仍然返回给调用者，但由于这些位置不是在使用这种形式的全球性存储，他们只提供给呼叫范围和下方，而不是整个项目层次结构。否 <lcName>_POPULATED 变量是在主叫方的这种形式的范围设定。

trans-unit.source: The <lcName>_SOURCE_DIR and <lcName>_BINARY_DIR variables are still returned to the caller, but since these locations are not stored as global properties when this form is used, they are only available to the calling scope and below rather than the entire project hierarchy. No <lcName>_POPULATED variable is set in the caller's scope with this form.
The <min> version of CMake given to the most recent call to the cmake_minimum_required(VERSION) command.
trans-unit.target: 给 cmake_minimum_required(VERSION) 命令的最新调用提供的CMake 的 <min> 版本。

trans-unit.source: The <multi_value_keywords> argument contains all keywords for this macro which can be followed by more than one value, like e.g. the TARGETS or FILES keywords of the install() command.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <multi_value_keywords> 参数中包含的所有关键字该宏其可以跟随一个以上的值，如例如 TARGETS 或 FILES 所述的关键字 install() 命令。

trans-unit.target: 组的 <name> 和 <prefix> 参数可以包含正斜杠或反斜杠以指定子组。反斜杠需要适当地转义：

trans-unit.source: The <one_value_keywords> argument contains all keywords for this macro which are followed by one value, like e.g. DESTINATION keyword of the install() command.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <one_value_keywords> 参数中包含该宏其后面是一个值，例如像所有关键字 DESTINATION 所述的关键字 install() 命令。

trans-unit.source: The <options> argument contains all options for the respective macro, i.e. keywords which can be used when calling the macro without any value following, like e.g. the OPTIONAL keyword of the install() command.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <options> 参数中包含用于各个宏，即，关键字可以调用当宏无任何值以下，如例如使用所有选项 OPTIONAL 所述的关键字 install() 命令。

trans-unit.source: The <path> given to INSTALL_DESTINATION must be the destination where the FooConfig.cmake file will be installed to. This path can either be absolute, or relative to the INSTALL_PREFIX path.
trans-unit.target: 赋予 INSTALL_DESTINATION 的 <path> 必须是 FooConfig.cmake 文件将安装到的目标。该路径可以是绝对路径，也可以是相对于 INSTALL_PREFIX 路径的路径。

trans-unit.source: The <replacement_expression> may refer to parenthesis-delimited subexpressions of the match using \1, \2, …, \9. Note that two backslashes (\\1) are required in CMake code to get a backslash through argument parsing.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <replacement_expression> 可以是指使用匹配的括号分隔子表达式 \1 ， \2 ，...， \9 。请注意，CMake代码中需要两个反斜杠（ \\1 ）才能通过参数解析获得反斜杠。

trans-unit.source: The <replacement_expression> may refer to parenthesis-delimited subexpressions of the match using \1, \2, ..., \9. Note that two backslashes (\\1) are required in CMake code to get a backslash through argument parsing.

The <result> variable, if specified, receives the status of the operation. It is set to 0 upon success or an error message otherwise. If RESULT is not specified and the operation fails, a fatal error is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <result> 变量，如果指定，接收操作的状态。成功时将其设置为 0 ，否则设置为错误消息。如果未指定 RESULT 且操作失败，则会发出致命错误。

trans-unit.source: The <result-var> will hold a boolean value giving the result of the check.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <result-var> 将持有一个布尔值给予检查的结果。

trans-unit.source: The <script> file must call CTest Commands commands to run testing steps explicitly as documented below. The commands obtain Dashboard Client Configuration settings from their arguments or from variables set in the script.
trans-unit.target: 在 <script> 文件必须调用CTEST命令命令来运行测试步骤如下明确作为记录。这些命令从其参数或脚本中设置的变量中获取“ 仪表板客户端配置”设置。
