trans-unit.source: The (...)* pattern shown above is to indicate that there can be zero or more item names, with multiple items separated by a directory-separator. The ()* characters are not part of the path.
The *.user.props files can be used for Visual Studio wide configuration which is independent from cmake.
trans-unit.target: 的 *.user.props 文件可用于为Visual Studio范围内的配置，其是独立于cmake的。

trans-unit.source: The --build flag enables a particular mode of operation for the cmake(1) tool. It invokes the CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM command associated with the generator, or the build tool configured by the user.
trans-unit.target: 所述 --build 标志能够操作为特定模式 cmake(1) 的工具。它调用与 generator 或用户配置的构建工具关联的 CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM 命令。

trans-unit.source: The --build mode also accepts a --config parameter in the case of multi-config generators to specify which particular configuration to build:
trans-unit.target: 所述 --build 模式还接受 --config 在多配置发电机的情况下，参数来指定特定的配置来构建：

trans-unit.source: The --build mode also accepts the parameter --target to specify a particular target to build, for example a particular library, executable or custom target, or a particular special target like install:
trans-unit.target: 该 --build 模式还接受参数 --target 指定一个特定的目标来构建，例如某个库，可执行文件或自定义的目标，或者像一个特定的特殊指标 install ：

trans-unit.source: The --build mode can also pass particular command line options to the underlying build tool by listing them after --. This can be useful to specify options to the build tool, such as to continue the build after a failed job, where CMake does not provide a high-level user interface.
trans-unit.target: 该 --build 模式也可以通过上市后他们通过特定的命令行选项基本构建工具 -- 。这对于指定构建工具的选项很有用，例如在失败的作业之后继续构建，而CMake不提供高级用户界面。

trans-unit.source: The --config option has no effect if the generator generates a buildsystem specific to a configuration which is chosen when invoking cmake with the CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE variable.
trans-unit.target: 该 --config 选项不起作用，如果产生器产生构建系统特定于它与调用的cmake时所选择的配置 CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE 变量。

trans-unit.source: The --progress option to ctest overrides this environment variable if both are given.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时给出了 ctest 的 --progress 选项，则会覆盖此环境变量。

trans-unit.source: The ADD_COMPILER_EXPORT_FLAGS function adds -fvisibility=hidden to CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS if supported, and is a no-op on Windows which does not need extra compiler flags for exporting support. You may optionally pass a single argument to ADD_COMPILER_EXPORT_FLAGS that will be populated with the CXX_FLAGS required to enable visibility support for the compiler/architecture in use.
trans-unit.target: 该 ADD_COMPILER_EXPORT_FLAGS 函数添加 -fvisibility=hidden 到 CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS 如果支持，并且是Windows上的任何操作，并不需要对出口的支持额外的编译器标志。您可以选择将单个参数传递给 ADD_COMPILER_EXPORT_FLAGS ，该参数将填充为启用对所用编译器/体系结构的可见性支持所需的 CXX_FLAGS 。

trans-unit.source: The BUILD_INTERFACE expression wraps requirements which are only used when consumed from a target in the same buildsystem, or when consumed from a target exported to the build directory using the export() command. The INSTALL_INTERFACE expression wraps requirements which are only used when consumed from a target which has been installed and exported with the install(EXPORT) command:

trans-unit.source: The BYPRODUCTS option is ignored on non-Ninja generators except to mark byproducts GENERATED.
trans-unit.target: 在非忍者生成器上， BYPRODUCTS 选项将被忽略，除了标记 GENERATED 副产品。

trans-unit.source: The BYPRODUCTS option is used by the Ninja generator to list byproducts among the outputs of the custom commands that generate them, and is ignored by other generators.

trans-unit.source: The BYPRODUCTS option is used by the Ninja generator to list byproducts among the outputs of the custom commands that generate them, and is ignored by other generators.

The CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER variables may be set to full paths, or to names of compilers to search for in standard locations. For toolchains that do not support linking binaries without custom flags or scripts one may set the CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_TARGET_TYPE variable to STATIC_LIBRARY to tell CMake not to try to link executables during its checks.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER 变量可以被设置为完整路径，或到编译器的名称来搜索标准位置。对于不支持链接二进制文件没有定制标记或脚本一个可以设置工具链 CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_TARGET_TYPE 变量 STATIC_LIBRARY 告诉CMake的不是在其检查尝试链接可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS variables and the configuration-specific equivalents contain flags that will be added to the compile command when compiling a file of a particular language.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS 变量和具体配置当量包含编译特定语言的文件时将被添加到编译命令标志。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER variable may be set explicitly before CUDA is first enabled by a project() or enable_language() command. This can be done via -DCMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER=... on the command line or in a toolchain file. Or, one may set the CUDAHOSTCXX environment variable to provide a default value.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER 变量可被显式地设置之前首先通过启用CUDA project() 或 enable_language() 命令。这可以通过 -DCMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER=... 在命令行或工具链文件中完成。或者，可以将 CUDAHOSTCXX 环境变量设置为提供默认值。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_INSTALL_MESSAGE variable may be set to control which messages are printed:
trans-unit.target: 可以将 CMAKE_INSTALL_MESSAGE 变量设置为控制打印哪些消息：

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM variable is set for use by project code. The value is also used by the cmake(1)--build and ctest(1)--build-and-test tools to launch the native build process.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM 变量设置为按项目代码中使用。该值也使用 cmake(1) --build 和 ctest(1) --build-and-test 工具来启动本机构建过程。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_MSVCIDE_RUN_PATH environment variable sets the default value for the CMAKE_MSVCIDE_RUN_PATH variable if not already explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_MSVCIDE_RUN_PATH 环境变量设置的默认值的 CMAKE_MSVCIDE_RUN_PATH 变量，如果没有明确设置。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES environment variable sets the default value for the CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES variable. See OSX_ARCHITECTURES for more information.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES 环境变量设置为默认值 CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES 变量。有关更多信息，请参见 OSX_ARCHITECTURES 。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH environment variable may be set to a list of directories specifying installation prefixes to be searched by the find_package(), find_program(), find_library(), find_file(), and find_path() commands. Each command will add appropriate subdirectories (like bin, lib, or include) as specified in its own documentation.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH 环境变量可以被设置为指定的目录安装的列表前缀由被搜索 find_package() ， find_program() ， find_library() ， find_file() ，和 find_path() 命令。每个命令将添加其自己的文档中指定的适当子目录（如 bin ， lib 或 include ）。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_SYSROOT content is passed to the compiler in the --sysroot flag, if supported. The path is also stripped from the RPATH/RUNPATH if necessary on installation. The CMAKE_SYSROOT is also used to prefix paths searched by the find_* commands.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_SYSROOT 内容传递到编译器的 --sysroot 标志，如果支持的话。路径也从剥离 RPATH / RUNPATH 如有必要安装。所述 CMAKE_SYSROOT 也用于前缀路径搜索由 find_* 的命令。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_VERSION variable is defined by CMake 2.6.3 and higher. Earlier versions defined only the individual component variables.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CMAKE_VERSION 变量由CMake的2.6.3和更高的定义。早期版本仅定义各个组件变量。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_XCODE_BUILD_SYSTEM variable is informational and should not be modified by project code. See the Toolset and Build System Selection documentation section to select the Xcode build system.
trans-unit.target: 该 CMAKE_XCODE_BUILD_SYSTEM 变量信息，不应由项目代码进行修改。请参阅“工具集和构建系统选择”文档部分以选择Xcode构建系统。

trans-unit.source: The CMAKE_XCODE_BUILD_SYSTEM variable is informational and should not be modified by project code. See the Toolset and Build System Selection documentation section to select the Xcode build system.
The COMMAND and WORKING_DIRECTORY options may use "generator expressions" with the syntax $<...>. See the cmake-generator-expressions(7) manual for available expressions.
The COMMAND and WORKING_DIRECTORY options may use “generator expressions” with the syntax $<...>. See the cmake-generator-expressions(7) manual for available expressions.
trans-unit.target: 该 COMMAND 和 WORKING_DIRECTORY 选项可以使用“发电机表达”的语法 $<...> 。有关可用表达式，请参见 cmake-generator-expressions(7) 手册。

trans-unit.source: The COMMAND and WORKING_DIRECTORY options may use “generator expressions” with the syntax $<...>. See the cmake-generator-expressions(7) manual for available expressions.
trans-unit.target: 该 COMMAND 和 WORKING_DIRECTORY 选项可以使用“发电机表达”的语法 $<...> 。有关可用表达式，请参见 cmake-generator-expressions(7) 手册。

trans-unit.source: The COMMENT, MAIN_DEPENDENCY, and WORKING_DIRECTORY options are currently ignored when APPEND is given, but may be used in the future.

The COMPATIBILITY mode AnyNewerVersion means that the installed package version will be considered compatible if it is newer or exactly the same as the requested version. This mode should be used for packages which are fully backward compatible, also across major versions. If SameMajorVersion is used instead, then the behaviour differs from AnyNewerVersion in that the major version number must be the same as requested, e.g. version 2.0 will not be considered compatible if 1.0 is requested. This mode should be used for packages which guarantee backward compatibility within the same major version. If SameMinorVersion is used, the behaviour is the same as SameMajorVersion, but both major and minor version must be the same as requested, e.g version 0.2 will not be compatible if 0.1 is requested. If ExactVersion is used, then the package is only considered compatible if the requested version matches exactly its own version number (not considering the tweak version). For example, version 1.2.3 of a package is only considered compatible to requested version 1.2.3. This mode is for packages without compatibility guarantees. If your project has more elaborated version matching rules, you will need to write your own custom ConfigVersion.cmake file instead of using this macro.
trans-unit.target: 在 COMPATIBILITY 模式 AnyNewerVersion 手段已安装的软件包版本将被认为是兼容的，如果它是新的或者完全一样的请求的版本。此模式应用于完全向下兼容的软件包，也适用于主要版本。如果 SameMajorVersion ，则该行为与 AnyNewerVersion 的不同之处在于，主要版本号必须与请求的版本号相同，例如，如果请求1.0，则认为2.0版不兼容。此模式应用于保证在同一主要版本中向后兼容的软件包。如果使用 SameMinorVersion ，则行为与 SameMajorVersion 相同，但主要版本和次要版本都必须与请求的版本相同，例如，如果请求0.1，则0.2版本将不兼容。如果使用 ExactVersion ，则仅当所请求的版本与其自身的版本号完全匹配（不考虑调整版本）时，才认为该软件包兼容。例如，软件包的1.2.3版本仅被视为与请求的1.2.3版本兼容。此模式适用于没有兼容性保证的软件包。如果您的项目具有更详细的版本匹配规则，则需要编写自己的自定义 ConfigVersion.cmake 文件，而不是使用此宏。

trans-unit.source: The COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_BOOL property may contain a list of properties for this target which must be consistent when evaluated as a boolean with the INTERFACE variant of the property in all linked dependees. For example, if a property FOO appears in the list, then for each dependee, the INTERFACE_FOO property content in all of its dependencies must be consistent with each other, and with the FOO property in the depender.
trans-unit.target: 该 COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_BOOL 属性可能包含此目标时作为与一个布尔评价必须是一致的属性列表 INTERFACE 属性的所有链接dependees变种。例如，如果属性 FOO 出现在列表中，则对于每个受抚养人，其所有依赖项中的 INTERFACE_FOO 属性内容必须彼此一致，并且必须与受抚养者中的 FOO 属性保持一致。

trans-unit.source: The COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_NUMBER_MAX property may contain a list of properties for this target whose maximum value may be read at generate time when evaluated in the INTERFACE variant of the property in all linked dependees. For example, if a property FOO appears in the list, then for each dependee, the INTERFACE_FOO property content in all of its dependencies will be compared with each other and with the FOO property in the depender. When reading the FOO property at generate time, the maximum value will be returned. If the property is not set, then it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该 COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_NUMBER_MAX 属性可能包含这一目标，其最大值可在计算时产生的时间读取属性列表 INTERFACE 属性的所有链接dependees变种。例如，如果属性 FOO 出现在列表中，则对于每个受抚养人，其所有依赖项中的 INTERFACE_FOO 属性内容将相互比较，并与受抚养者中的 FOO 属性进行比较。在生成时读取 FOO 属性时，将返回最大值。如果未设置该属性，则将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: The COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_NUMBER_MIN property may contain a list of properties for this target whose minimum value may be read at generate time when evaluated in the INTERFACE variant of the property of all linked dependees. For example, if a property FOO appears in the list, then for each dependee, the INTERFACE_FOO property content in all of its dependencies will be compared with each other and with the FOO property in the depender. When reading the FOO property at generate time, the minimum value will be returned. If the property is not set, then it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该 COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_NUMBER_MIN 属性可能包含这一目标，其最小值可以在计算时产生的时间读取属性列表 INTERFACE 的所有链接dependees财产的变型。例如，如果属性 FOO 出现在列表中，则对于每个受抚养人，其所有依赖项中的 INTERFACE_FOO 属性内容将相互比较，并与受抚养者中的 FOO 属性进行比较。在生成时读取 FOO 属性时，将返回最小值。如果未设置该属性，则将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: The COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_STRING property may contain a list of properties for this target which must be the same when evaluated as a string in the INTERFACE variant of the property all linked dependees. For example, if a property FOO appears in the list, then for each dependee, the INTERFACE_FOO property content in all of its dependencies must be equal with each other, and with the FOO property in the depender. If the property is not set, then it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该 COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_STRING 属性可能包含这一目标时，作为一个字符串评估必须是同一属性的列表 INTERFACE 的产权所有链接dependees的变种。例如，如果属性 FOO 出现在列表中，则对于每个受抚养人，其所有依赖项中的 INTERFACE_FOO 属性内容必须彼此相等，并且受抚养者中的 FOO 属性必须相等。如果未设置该属性，则将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: The COMPILE_DEFINITIONS property may be set to a semicolon-separated list of preprocessor definitions using the syntax VAR or VAR=value. Function-style definitions are not supported. CMake will automatically escape the value correctly for the native build system (note that CMake language syntax may require escapes to specify some values).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用语法 VAR 或 VAR=value 将 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 属性设置为以分号分隔的预处理器定义列表。不支持函数样式的定义。 CMake将自动为本机构建系统正确地转义该值（请注意，CMake语言语法可能需要转义以指定某些值）。

trans-unit.source: The COMPILE_DEFINITIONS property may be set to a semicolon-separated list of preprocessor definitions using the syntax VAR or VAR=value. Function-style definitions are not supported. CMake will automatically escape the value correctly for the native build system (note that CMake language syntax may require escapes to specify some values). This property may be set on a per-configuration basis using the name COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_<CONFIG> where <CONFIG> is an upper-case name (ex. COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_DEBUG).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用语法 VAR 或 VAR=value 将 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 属性设置为以分号分隔的预处理器定义列表。不支持函数样式的定义。 CMake将自动为本机构建系统正确地转义该值（请注意，CMake语言语法可能需要转义以指定某些值）。可使用名称 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_<CONFIG> 在每个配置的基础上设置此属性，其中 <CONFIG> 是大写名称（例如 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_DEBUG ）。

trans-unit.source: The COMPILE_FLAGS property sets additional compiler flags used to build sources within the target. Use COMPILE_DEFINITIONS to pass additional preprocessor definitions.
trans-unit.target: 该 COMPILE_FLAGS 属性设置目标范围内用于构建源其它编译器选项。使用 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 可以传递其他预处理器定义。

trans-unit.source: The COMPILE_FLAGS property, managed as a string, sets additional compiler flags used to build source files. Use COMPILE_DEFINITIONS to pass additional preprocessor definitions.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式管理的 COMPILE_FLAGS 属性设置用于构建源文件的其他编译器标志。使用 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 可以传递其他预处理器定义。

trans-unit.source: The CONFIG option, the synonymous NO_MODULE option, or the use of options not specified in the basic signature all enforce pure Config mode. In pure Config mode, the command skips Module mode search and proceeds at once with Config mode search.
trans-unit.target: 在 CONFIG 选项，同义 NO_MODULE 选项，或使用在未指定的选项基本签名的所有执行纯配置模式。在纯配置模式下，该命令将跳过模块模式搜索，并立即进行配置模式搜索。

trans-unit.source: The CONFIG parameter is compared case-insensitively with the configuration being built. In the presence of IMPORTED targets, the content of MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_DEBUG is also accounted for by this expression.
trans-unit.target: 该 CONFIG 与配置在建参数比较不区分大小写。在存在 IMPORTED 目标的内容 MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_DEBUG 也由该表达占。

trans-unit.source: The COPY signature copies files, directories, and symlinks to a destination folder. Relative input paths are evaluated with respect to the current source directory, and a relative destination is evaluated with respect to the current build directory. Copying preserves input file timestamps, and optimizes out a file if it exists at the destination with the same timestamp. Copying preserves input permissions unless explicit permissions or NO_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS are given (default is USE_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS).
trans-unit.target: 该 COPY 签名复制文件，目录和符号链接到目标文件夹。相对于当前源目录评估相对输入路径，相对于当前构建目录评估相对目的地。复制将保留输入文件的时间戳，并优化文件（如果该文件位于具有相同时间戳的目的地）。复制将保留输入权限，除非给出明确的权限或 NO_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS （默认为 USE_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS ）。

trans-unit.source: The CUDA_ARCHITECTURES target property must be set to a non-empty value on targets that compile CUDA sources, or it is an error. See policy CMP0104.
trans-unit.target: 该 CUDA_ARCHITECTURES 目标属性必须设置为一个非空值的目标是编译CUDA源，或者这是一个错误。请参阅策略 CMP0104 。

trans-unit.source: The Cancelled Message is never printed because its command is cancelled. The deferred_message variable reference is not evaluated until the call site, so it can be set after the deferred call is scheduled.
trans-unit.target: 该 Cancelled Message 从不打印，因为它的命令被取消。该 deferred_message 变量引用不计算，直到调用点，所以它可以递延呼叫调度后进行设置。

trans-unit.source: The ClimbingStats_FINAL macro will expand to final if the compiler (and its flags) support the cxx_final feature, and the ClimbingStats_CONSTEXPR macro will expand to constexpr if cxx_constexpr is supported.
trans-unit.target: 该 ClimbingStats_FINAL 宏将扩展到 final 如果编译器（和它的标志）支持 cxx_final 功能，以及 ClimbingStats_CONSTEXPR 宏将扩大到 constexpr 如果 cxx_constexpr 支持。

trans-unit.source: The DATA{} syntax can alternatively match files associated with the named file and contained in the same directory. Associated files may be specified by options using the syntax DATA{<name>,<opt1>,<opt2>,...}. Each option may specify one file by name or specify a regular expression to match file names using the syntax REGEX:<regex>. For example, the arguments:
trans-unit.target: 该 DATA{} 语法可以交替搭配指定的文件在同一目录和相关文件所载。可以通过选项使用语法 DATA{<name>,<opt1>,<opt2>,...} 指定关联文件。每个选项都可以按名称指定一个文件，也可以指定正则表达式以使用语法 REGEX:<regex> 匹配文件名。例如，参数：

trans-unit.source: The DATA{} syntax can be told to fetch a file series using the form DATA{<name>,:}, where the : is literal. If the source tree contains a group of files or content links named like a series then a reference to one member adds rules to fetch all of them. Although all members of a series are fetched, only the file originally named by the DATA{} argument is substituted for it. The default configuration recognizes file series names ending with #.ext, _#.ext, .#.ext, or -#.ext where # is a sequence of decimal digits and .ext is any single extension. Configure it with a regex that parses <number> and <suffix> parts from the end of <name>:
trans-unit.target: 该 DATA{} 语法可以告诉抓取使用形式的文件系列 DATA{<name>,:} ，其中 : 是文字。如果源树包含一组命名为一系列的文件或内容链接，则对一个成员的引用将添加规则以提取所有规则。尽管获取了系列的所有成员，但是只有最初由 DATA{} 参数命名的文件才被替换。默认配置可识别以 #.ext ， _#.ext ， .#.ext 或 -#.ext 结尾的文件系列名称，其中 # 是十进制数字和 .ext 的序列是任何单个扩展名。使用正则表达式配置它，该正则表达式从 <name> 的末尾解析 <number> 和 <suffix> 部分：

trans-unit.source: The DATA{} syntax is literal and the <name> is a full or relative path within the source tree. The source tree must contain either a real data file at <name> or a "content link" at <name><ext> containing a hash of the real file using a hash algorithm corresponding to <ext>. For example, the argument DATA{img.png} may be satisfied by either a real img.png file in the current source directory or a img.png.md5 file containing its MD5 sum.

The DATA{} syntax is literal and the <name> is a full or relative path within the source tree. The source tree must contain either a real data file at <name> or a “content link” at <name><ext> containing a hash of the real file using a hash algorithm corresponding to <ext>. For example, the argument DATA{img.png} may be satisfied by either a real img.png file in the current source directory or a img.png.md5 file containing its MD5 sum.
trans-unit.target: 该 DATA{} 语法是字面和 <name> 是源树内的完整或相对路径。源树必须包含位于 <name> 的真实数据文件或位于 <name><ext> 的“内容链接”，其中使用对应于 <ext> 的哈希算法包含真实文件的哈希。例如，参数 DATA{img.png} 可以由当前源目录中的实际 img.png 文件或包含其MD5和的 img.png.md5 文件满足。

trans-unit.source: The DATA{} syntax may reference a directory using a trailing slash and a list of associated files. The form DATA{<name>/,<opt1>,<opt2>,...} adds rules to fetch any files in the directory that match one of the associated file options. For example, the argument DATA{MyDataDir/,REGEX:.*} will pass the full path to a MyDataDir directory on the command line and ensure that the directory contains files corresponding to every file or content link in the MyDataDir source directory.

The DATA{} syntax may reference a directory using a trailing slash and a list of associated files. The form DATA{<name>/,<opt1>,<opt2>,...} adds rules to fetch any files in the directory that match one of the associated file options. For example, the argument DATA{MyDataDir/,REGEX:.*} will pass the full path to a MyDataDir directory on the command line and ensure that the directory contains files corresponding to every file or content link in the MyDataDir source directory. In order to match associated files in subdirectories, specify a RECURSE: option, e.g. DATA{MyDataDir/,RECURSE:,REGEX:.*}.
trans-unit.target: 该 DATA{} 语法可以使用斜线和相关联的文件的列表引用一个目录。格式 DATA{<name>/,<opt1>,<opt2>,...} 添加规则以提取目录中与关联文件选项之一匹配的任何文件。例如，参数 DATA{MyDataDir/,REGEX:.*} 将把完整路径传递到命令行上的 MyDataDir 目录，并确保该目录包含与 MyDataDir 源目录中的每个文件或内容链接相对应的文件。为了匹配子目录中的关联文件，请指定 RECURSE: 选项，例如 DATA{MyDataDir/,RECURSE:,REGEX:.*} 。

trans-unit.source: The DIRECTORY argument specifies another directory from which to retrieve the property value instead of the current directory. It may reference either a source directory, or since CMake 3.19, a binary directory. Relative paths are treated as relative to the current source directory. CMake must already know about the directory, either by having added it through a call to add_subdirectory() or being the top level directory.
trans-unit.target: 该 DIRECTORY 参数指定另一个目录，从中获取属性值，而不是当前目录。它可以引用源目录，也可以引用自CMake 3.19之后的二进制目录。相对路径被视为相对于当前源目录的路径。 CMake必须已经知道该目录，可以通过调用 add_subdirectory() 将其添加到目录中，也可以是顶层目录。

trans-unit.source: The DIRECTORY argument specifies another directory from which to retrieve the property value instead of the current directory. Relative paths are treated as relative to the current source directory. CMake must already know about the directory, either by having added it through a call to add_subdirectory() or being the top level directory.

The DIRECTORY form installs contents of one or more directories to a given destination. The directory structure is copied verbatim to the destination. The last component of each directory name is appended to the destination directory but a trailing slash may be used to avoid this because it leaves the last component empty. Directory names given as relative paths are interpreted with respect to the current source directory. If no input directory names are given the destination directory will be created but nothing will be installed into it. The FILE_PERMISSIONS and DIRECTORY_PERMISSIONS options specify permissions given to files and directories in the destination. If USE_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS is specified and FILE_PERMISSIONS is not, file permissions will be copied from the source directory structure. If no permissions are specified files will be given the default permissions specified in the FILES form of the command, and the directories will be given the default permissions specified in the PROGRAMS form of the command.
trans-unit.target: 该 DIRECTORY 的形式安装一个或多个目录的内容，以给定的目标。目录结构被逐字复制到目标位置。每个目录名称的最后一个组件都附加到目标目录，但是可以使用后跟斜杠来避免这种情况，因为它将最后一个组件留空。相对路径给出的目录名称是相对于当前源目录进行解释的。如果未提供输入目录名称，将创建目标目录，但不会安装任何内容。该 FILE_PERMISSIONS 和 DIRECTORY_PERMISSIONS 选项指定给在目标文件和目录的权限。如果指定了 USE_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS 并且 FILE_PERMISSIONS 不是，文件权限将从源目录结构中复制。如果未指定权限，则将为 FILES 提供在命令的FILES形式中指定的默认权限，而目录将被赋予在命令的 PROGRAMS 形式中指定的默认权限。

trans-unit.source: The DOWNLOAD mode downloads the given <url> to a local <file>. The UPLOAD mode uploads a local <file> to a given <url>.
trans-unit.target: 该 DOWNLOAD 方式下载指定的 <url> 到本地 <file> 。所述 UPLOAD 模式上传的本地 <file> 给定的 <url> 。

trans-unit.source: The DOWNLOAD subcommand downloads the given <url> to a local <file>. If <file> is not specified for file(DOWNLOAD), the file is not saved. This can be useful if you want to know if a file can be downloaded (for example, to check that it exists) without actually saving it anywhere. The UPLOAD mode uploads a local <file> to a given <url>.
trans-unit.target: 该 DOWNLOAD 子命令下载指定的 <url> 到本地 <file> 。如果未为 file(DOWNLOAD) 指定 <file> ，则不保存文件。如果您想知道是否可以下载文件（例如，检查文件是否存在）而不实际将其保存在任何地方，则此功能很有用。所述 UPLOAD 模式上传的本地 <file> 给定的 <url> 。

trans-unit.source: The DOWNLOAD subcommand downloads the given <url> to a local <file>. The UPLOAD mode uploads a local <file> to a given <url>.
The EXACT option requests that the version be matched exactly. This option is incompatible with the specification of a version range.
trans-unit.target: 该 EXACT 选项要求的版本完全匹配。此选项与版本范围的规范不兼容。

trans-unit.source: The EXPORT form generates and installs a CMake file containing code to import targets from the installation tree into another project. Target installations are associated with the export <export-name> using the EXPORT option of the install(TARGETS) signature documented above. The NAMESPACE option will prepend <namespace> to the target names as they are written to the import file. By default the generated file will be called <export-name>.cmake but the FILE option may be used to specify a different name. The value given to the FILE option must be a file name with the .cmake extension. If a CONFIGURATIONS option is given then the file will only be installed when one of the named configurations is installed. Additionally, the generated import file will reference only the matching target configurations. The EXPORT_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES keyword, if present, causes the contents of the properties matching (IMPORTED_)?LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES(_<CONFIG>)? to be exported, when policy CMP0022 is NEW.
trans-unit.target: 在 EXPORT 的形式产生，并安装包含代码从安装树的进口指标纳入另一个项目的CMake文件。使用上面记录的install（TARGETS）签名的 EXPORT 选项，将目标安装与导出 <export-name> 关联。该 NAMESPACE 选项会在前面加上 <namespace> ，因为他们被写入导入文件中的目标名称。默认情况下，生成的文件名为 <export-name>.cmake ,但是 FILE 选项可用于指定其他名称。赋予 FILE 选项的值必须是带有 .cmake 的文件名延期。如果给出了 CONFIGURATIONS 选项，则仅在安装了一种命名配置时才安装文件。此外，生成的导入文件将仅引用匹配的目标配置。的 EXPORT_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES 关键字，如果存在的话，会导致匹配属性的内容 (IMPORTED_)?LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES(_<CONFIG>)? 策略 CMP0022 为 NEW 时要导出。

trans-unit.source: The EXPORT form is useful to help outside projects use targets built and installed by the current project. For example, the code
trans-unit.target: 该 EXPORT 形式是帮助以外的项目使用当前项目建造和安装的目标是有用的。例如，代码

trans-unit.source: The ExternalData_Add_Target function creates a custom target to manage local instances of data files stored externally:
trans-unit.target: 该 ExternalData_Add_Target 函数创建一个自定义的目标来管理外部存储数据文件的本地实例：

trans-unit.source: The ExternalData_Add_Test function wraps around the CMake add_test() command but supports DATA{} references in its arguments:
trans-unit.target: 该 ExternalData_Add_Test 围绕CMake的功能包装 add_test() 命令，但支持 DATA{} 在它的参数引用：

trans-unit.source: The ExternalData_BINARY_ROOT variable may be set to the directory to hold the real data files named by expanded DATA{} references. The default is CMAKE_BINARY_DIR. The directory layout will mirror that of content links under ExternalData_SOURCE_ROOT.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 ExternalData_BINARY_ROOT 变量设置为目录，以保存由扩展 DATA{} 引用命名的实际数据文件。默认值为 CMAKE_BINARY_DIR 。目录布局将镜像 ExternalData_SOURCE_ROOT 下的内容链接的布局。

trans-unit.source: The ExternalData_Expand_Arguments function evaluates DATA{} references in its arguments and constructs a new list of arguments:
trans-unit.target: 该 ExternalData_Expand_Arguments 功能评估 DATA{} 在它的参数引用，并构建一个新的参数列表：

trans-unit.source: The ExternalData_LINK_CONTENT variable may be set to the name of a supported hash algorithm to enable automatic conversion of real data files referenced by the DATA{} syntax into content links. For each such <file> a content link named <file><ext> is created. The original file is renamed to the form .ExternalData_<algo>_<hash> to stage it for future transmission to one of the locations in the list of URL templates (by means outside the scope of this module). The data fetch rule created for the content link will use the staged object if it cannot be found using any URL template.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 ExternalData_LINK_CONTENT 变量设置为受支持的哈希算法的名称，以实现将 DATA{} 语法引用的实际数据文件自动转换为内容链接。对于每个这样的 <file> ,都会创建一个名为 <file><ext> 的内容链接。将原始文件重命名为 .ExternalData_<algo>_<hash> 形式，以暂存该文件，以备将来传输到URL模板列表中的某个位置（通过此模块的范围之外）。如果无法使用任何URL模板找到为内容链接创建的数据获取规则，它将使用暂存的对象。

trans-unit.source: The ExternalData_OBJECT_STORES variable may be set to a list of local directories that store objects using the layout <dir>/%(algo)/%(hash). These directories will be searched first for a needed object. If the object is not available in any store then it will be fetched remotely using the URL templates and added to the first local store listed. If no stores are specified the default is a location inside the build tree.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 ExternalData_OBJECT_STORES 变量设置为使用布局 <dir>/%(algo)/%(hash) 存储对象的本地目录列表。将首先在这些目录中搜索所需的对象。如果该对象在任何商店中均不可用，则将使用URL模板远程获取该对象并将其添加到列出的第一个本地商店中。如果未指定存储，则默认为构建树内的位置。

trans-unit.source: The ExternalData_SOURCE_ROOT variable may be set to the highest source directory containing any path named by a DATA{} reference. The default is CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR. ExternalData_SOURCE_ROOT and CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR must refer to directories within a single source distribution (e.g. they come together in one tarball).
trans-unit.target: 可以将 ExternalData_SOURCE_ROOT 变量设置为包含由 DATA{} 引用命名的任何路径的最高源目录。默认值为 CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR 。 ExternalData_SOURCE_ROOT 和 CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR 必须引用单个源分发中的目录（例如，它们在一个压缩包中在一起）。

trans-unit.source: The ExternalData_TIMEOUT_ABSOLUTE variable sets the download absolute timeout, in seconds, with a default of 300 seconds. Set to 0 to disable enforcement.
trans-unit.target: 该 ExternalData_TIMEOUT_ABSOLUTE 变量设置下载绝对超时，单位秒，默认值为 300 秒。设置为 0 以禁用强制执行。

trans-unit.source: The ExternalData_TIMEOUT_INACTIVITY variable sets the download inactivity timeout, in seconds, with a default of 60 seconds. Set to 0 to disable enforcement.
trans-unit.target: 该 ExternalData_TIMEOUT_INACTIVITY 变量设置下载闲置超时，单位秒，默认值为 60 秒。设置为 0 以禁用强制执行。

trans-unit.source: The ExternalData_URL_TEMPLATES may be set to provide a list of URL templates using the placeholders %(algo) and %(hash) in each template. Data fetch rules try each URL template in order by substituting the hash algorithm name for %(algo) and the hash value for %(hash). Alternatively one may use %(algo:<key>) with ExternalData_URL_ALGO_<algo>_<key> variables to gain more flexibility in remote URLs.
trans-unit.target: 该 ExternalData_URL_TEMPLATES 可以设置为提供使用占位符URL模板列表 %(algo) 和 %(hash) 在每个模板。数据提取规则通过将哈希算法名称替换为 %(algo) 和哈希值替换为 %(hash) 依次尝试每个URL模板。或者，可以将 %(algo:<key>) 与 ExternalData_URL_ALGO_<algo>_<key> 变量一起使用，以在远程URL中获得更大的灵活性。

trans-unit.source: The ExternalData_URL_TEMPLATES may be set to provide a list of of URL templates using the placeholders %(algo) and %(hash) in each template. Data fetch rules try each URL template in order by substituting the hash algorithm name for %(algo) and the hash value for %(hash). Alternatively one may use %(algo:<key>) with ExternalData_URL_ALGO_<algo>_<key> variables to gain more flexibility in remote URLs.
trans-unit.target: 该 ExternalData_URL_TEMPLATES 可以设置为提供的使用占位符URL模板列表 %(algo) 和 %(hash) 在每个模板。数据提取规则通过将哈希算法名称替换为 %(algo) 和哈希值替换为 %(hash) 依次尝试每个URL模板。或者，可以将 %(algo:<key>) 与 ExternalData_URL_ALGO_<algo>_<key> 变量一起使用，以在远程URL中获得更大的灵活性。

trans-unit.source: The ExternalProject_Add() function creates a custom target to drive download, update/patch, configure, build, install and test steps of an external project:
trans-unit.target: 该 ExternalProject_Add() 函数创建一个自定义的目标来驱动下载，更新/补丁，配置，编译，安装和外部项目的测试步骤：

trans-unit.source: The ExternalProject_Add() function on its own is often sufficient for incorporating an external project into the main build. Certain scenarios require additional work to implement desired behavior, such as adding in a custom step or making steps available as manually triggerable targets. The ExternalProject_Add_Step(), ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() and ExternalProject_Add_StepDependencies functions provide the lower level control needed to implement such step-level capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 该 ExternalProject_Add() 在其自身的功能往往是足以包含一个外部项目进入主版本。某些方案需要额外的工作来实现所需的行为，例如添加自定义步骤或使步骤可用作手动可触发目标。所述 ExternalProject_Add_Step() ， ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() 和 ExternalProject_Add_StepDependencies 函数提供实现这样的步骤级别能力所需的较低级控制。

trans-unit.source: The ExternalProject_Add_Step() function specifies an additional custom step for an external project defined by an earlier call to ExternalProject_Add():
trans-unit.target: 所述 ExternalProject_Add_Step() 函数指定为通过到较早的呼叫所定义的外部项目的附加自定义步骤 ExternalProject_Add() ：

trans-unit.source: The ExternalProject_Add_StepDependencies() function can be used to add dependencies to a step. The dependencies added must be targets CMake already knows about (these can be ordinary executable or library targets, custom targets or even step targets of another external project):
trans-unit.target: 所述 ExternalProject_Add_StepDependencies() 函数可以被用来依赖性增加的步骤。添加的依赖项必须是CMake已经知道的目标（这些可以是普通的可执行文件或库目标，自定义目标，甚至是另一个外部项目的步骤目标）：

trans-unit.source: The ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() function generates targets for the steps listed. The name of each created target will be of the form <name>-<step>:
trans-unit.target: 所述 ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() 函数生成用于列出的步骤的目标。每个创建的目标的名称将采用 <name>-<step> 的形式：

trans-unit.source: The ExternalProject_Get_Property() function retrieves external project target properties:
trans-unit.target: 该 ExternalProject_Get_Property() 函数获取外部项目目标属性：

trans-unit.source: The FATAL_ERROR option is accepted but ignored by CMake 2.6 and higher. It should be specified so CMake versions 2.4 and lower fail with an error instead of just a warning.
trans-unit.target: 该 FATAL_ERROR 选项被接受，但通过CMake的2.6和更高忽略。应该指定它，以便CMake 2.4及更低版本失败并显示错误，而不仅仅是警告。

trans-unit.source: The FETCHCONTENT_FULLY_DISCONNECTED and FETCHCONTENT_UPDATES_DISCONNECTED cache variables are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该 FETCHCONTENT_FULLY_DISCONNECTED 和 FETCHCONTENT_UPDATES_DISCONNECTED 缓存变量被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The FILES form specifies rules for installing files for a project. File names given as relative paths are interpreted with respect to the current source directory. Files installed by this form are by default given permissions OWNER_WRITE, OWNER_READ, GROUP_READ, and WORLD_READ if no PERMISSIONS argument is given.
trans-unit.target: 该 FILES 形成为一个项目安装文件，指定规则。相对路径给出的文件名将相对于当前源目录进行解释。如果未提供 PERMISSIONS 参数，则默认情况下，通过此表单安装的文件将具有 OWNER_WRITE ， OWNER_READ ， GROUP_READ 和 WORLD_READ 权限。

trans-unit.source: The FetchContent module also supports defining and populating content in a single call, with no check for whether the content has been populated elsewhere in the project already. This is a more low level operation and would not normally be the way the module is used, but it is sometimes useful as part of implementing some higher level feature or to populate some content in CMake’s script mode.
trans-unit.target: 该 FetchContent 模块还支持定义和填充在一个单一的通话内容，不检查的内容是否已被填充在项目的其他地方了。这是一个较低级别的操作，通常不是模块的使用方式，但是有时在实现某些高级功能或以CMake的脚本模式填充某些内容时很有用。

trans-unit.source: The FetchContent module also supports defining and populating content in a single call, with no check for whether the content has been populated elsewhere in the project already. This is a more low level operation and would not normally be the way the module is used, but it is sometimes useful as part of implementing some higher level feature or to populate some content in CMake's script mode.

The FetchContent_Declare() function records the options that describe how to populate the specified content, but if such details have already been recorded earlier in this project (regardless of where in the project hierarchy), this and all later calls for the same content <name> are ignored. This "first to record, wins" approach is what allows hierarchical projects to have parent projects override content details of child projects.

The FetchContent_Declare() function records the options that describe how to populate the specified content, but if such details have already been recorded earlier in this project (regardless of where in the project hierarchy), this and all later calls for the same content <name> are ignored. This “first to record, wins” approach is what allows hierarchical projects to have parent projects override content details of child projects.
trans-unit.target: 该 FetchContent_Declare() 函数记录，描述了如何填充指定内容的选项，但如果这样的细节已经早在这个项目记录（无论在项目层次结构中的），这和所有以后调用相同内容 <name> 被忽略。这种“先记录后取胜”的方法使分层项目可以使父项目覆盖子项目的内容详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The FetchContent_Populate() command also supports a syntax allowing the content details to be specified directly rather than using any saved details. This is more low-level and use of this form is generally to be avoided in favour of using saved content details as outlined above. Nevertheless, in certain situations it can be useful to invoke the content population as an isolated operation (typically as part of implementing some other higher level feature or when using CMake in script mode):
trans-unit.target: 所述 FetchContent_Populate() 命令还支持一个语法允许将所指定的内容的信息，而不是直接使用任何保存的细节。这是更底层的，通常应避免使用此表单，而倾向于使用如上所述的已保存内容详细信息。不过，在某些情况下，将内容填充作为一个独立的操作来调用可能是有用的（通常作为实现某些其他更高级别功能的一部分，或者在脚本模式下使用CMake时）：

trans-unit.source: The Foo fixture has no setup tests defined, only a single cleanup test.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Foo 夹具具有限定没有设置测试中，仅单个清理试验。

trans-unit.source: The FortranCInterface_HEADER function is provided to generate a C header file containing macros to mangle symbol names:
trans-unit.target: 所述 FortranCInterface_HEADER 提供功能，以产生包含宏到碾压符号名C头文件：

trans-unit.source: The FortranCInterface_VERIFY function is provided to verify that the Fortran and C/C++ compilers work together:
trans-unit.target: 所述 FortranCInterface_VERIFY 提供功能来验证Fortran和C / C ++编译器的协同工作：

trans-unit.source: The GENERATE_EXPORT_HEADER function can be used to generate a file suitable for preprocessor inclusion which contains EXPORT macros to be used in library classes:
trans-unit.target: 该 GENERATE_EXPORT_HEADER 功能可用于产生适合于包含EXPORT宏在库中的类使用预处理器包含一个文件：

trans-unit.source: The GLOB_RECURSE mode will traverse all the subdirectories of the matched directory and match the files. Subdirectories that are symlinks are only traversed if FOLLOW_SYMLINKS is given or policy CMP0009 is not set to NEW.
trans-unit.target: 该 GLOB_RECURSE 模式将遍历匹配目录下的所有子目录和匹配的文件。子目录是符号链接，如果只经过 FOLLOW_SYMLINKS 给予或政策 CMP0009 未设置为 NEW 。

trans-unit.source: The IMPORTED_LIBNAME property is allowed only on importedInterface Libraries and is rejected on targets of other types (for which the IMPORTED_LOCATION target property may be used).
trans-unit.target: 所述 IMPORTED_LIBNAME 属性仅允许在进口接口库和被拒绝对其他类型的目标（其 IMPORTED_LOCATION 目标属性可以被使用）。

trans-unit.source: The IMPORTED_LOCATION target property may be overridden for a given configuration <CONFIG> by the configuration-specific IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> target property. Furthermore, the MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_<CONFIG> target property may be used to map between a project’s configurations and those of an imported target. If none of these is set then the name of any other configuration listed in the IMPORTED_CONFIGURATIONS target property may be selected and its IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> value used.
trans-unit.target: 所述 IMPORTED_LOCATION 目标属性可能会被改写为一个给定的配置 <CONFIG> 通过配置特定的 IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> 目标属性。此外， MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_<CONFIG> 目标属性可用于在项目配置和导入目标的配置之间进行映射。如果未设置任何一个，则可以选择 IMPORTED_CONFIGURATIONS 目标属性中列出的任何其他配置的名称，并使用其 IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> 值。

trans-unit.source: The IMPORTED_LOCATION target property may be overridden for a given configuration <CONFIG> by the configuration-specific IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> target property. Furthermore, the MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_<CONFIG> target property may be used to map between a project's configurations and those of an imported target. If none of these is set then the name of any other configuration listed in the IMPORTED_CONFIGURATIONS target property may be selected and its IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> value used.

The IMPORTED_TARGET argument will create an imported target named PkgConfig::<prefix> that can be passed directly as an argument to target_link_libraries(). The GLOBAL argument will make the imported target available in global scope.
trans-unit.target: 该 IMPORTED_TARGET 参数将创建一个名为导入的目标 PkgConfig::<prefix> 可以直接作为参数传递到 target_link_libraries() 。该 GLOBAL 参数将在全球范围内提供的进口目标。

trans-unit.source: The INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS option for ExternalProject_Add(), or the EP_INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS directory property, tells the function to call ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() internally using the NO_DEPENDS option for the specified steps.
trans-unit.target: ExternalProject_Add() 的 INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS 选项或 EP_INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS 目录属性，告诉函数使用 NO_DEPENDS 选项在内部为指定的步骤内部调用 ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() 。

trans-unit.source: The INSTALL signature differs slightly from COPY: it prints status messages (subject to the CMAKE_INSTALL_MESSAGE variable), and NO_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS is default. Installation scripts generated by the install() command use this signature (with some undocumented options for internal use).
trans-unit.target: 的 INSTALL 从稍微不同签名 COPY ：它打印状态消息（受 CMAKE_INSTALL_MESSAGE 变量），并且 NO_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS 是默认值。 install() 命令生成的安装脚本使用此签名（以及一些未记录的内部使用选项）。

trans-unit.source: The INSTALL signature differs slightly from COPY: it prints status messages (subject to the CMAKE_INSTALL_MESSAGE variable), and NO_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS is default. Installation scripts generated by the install() command use this signature (with some undocumented options for internal use).
trans-unit.target: 的 INSTALL 从稍微不同签名 COPY ：它打印状态消息（受 CMAKE_INSTALL_MESSAGE 变量），并且 NO_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS 是默认值。 install() 命令生成的安装脚本使用此签名（以及一些未记录的内部使用选项）。

trans-unit.source: The INSTALL_INTERFACE of the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES is only suitable for specifying the required include directories for headers provided with the target itself, not those provided by the transitive dependencies listed in its INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES target property. Those dependencies should themselves be targets that specify their own header locations in INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES.
trans-unit.target: 所述 INSTALL_INTERFACE 所述的 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 只适合指定所需的包括目录中设置与目标本身，而不是那些在其列出的传递依赖提供标题 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES 目标属性。这些依赖关系本身应该是在 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 中指定其自己的标头位置的目标。

trans-unit.source: The INSTALL_INTERFACE of the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES is only suitable for specifying the required include directories for headers provided with the target itself, not those provided by the transitive dependencies listed in its INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES target property. Those dependencies should themselves be targets that specify their own header locations in INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES.
trans-unit.target: 所述 INSTALL_INTERFACE 所述的 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 只适合指定所需的包括目录中设置与目标本身，而不是那些在其列出的传递依赖提供标题 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES 目标属性。这些依赖关系本身应该是在 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 中指定自己的标头位置的目标。

trans-unit.source: The INSTALL_INTERFACE of the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES is only suitable for specifying the required include directories for headers provided with the target itself, not those provided by the transitive dependencies listed in its INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES target property. Those dependencies should themselves be targets that specify their own header locations in INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES.
trans-unit.target: 所述 INSTALL_INTERFACE 所述的 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 只适合指定所需的包括目录中设置与目标本身，而不是那些在其列出的传递依赖提供标题 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES 目标属性。这些依赖关系本身应该是在 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 中指定自己的标头位置的目标。

trans-unit.source: The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the features. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the COMPILE_FEATURES property of <target>. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_COMPILE_FEATURES property of <target>. (IMPORTED targets only support INTERFACE items.) Repeated calls for the same <target> append items.
trans-unit.target: 需要 INTERFACE ， PUBLIC 和 PRIVATE 关键字来指定功能范围。 PRIVATE 和 PUBLIC 项目将填充 <target> 的 COMPILE_FEATURES 属性。 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 项目将填充 <target> 的 INTERFACE_COMPILE_FEATURES 属性。 （导入的目标仅支持 INTERFACE 项目。）重复调用相同的 <target> 附加项目。

trans-unit.source: The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the features. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the COMPILE_FEATURES property of <target>. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_COMPILE_FEATURES property of <target>. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items.

The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the following arguments. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the COMPILE_DEFINITIONS property of <target>. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS property of <target>. (IMPORTED targets only support INTERFACE items.) The following arguments specify compile definitions. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items in the order called.
trans-unit.target: 需要 INTERFACE ， PUBLIC 和 PRIVATE 关键字来指定以下参数的范围。 PRIVATE 和 PUBLIC 项目将填充 <target> 的 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 属性。 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 项目将填充 <target> 的 INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 属性。 （“ 导入的”目标仅支持 INTERFACE 项。）以下参数指定编译定义。重复调用相同的 <target> 会按调用顺序追加项目。

trans-unit.source: The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the following arguments. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the COMPILE_DEFINITIONS property of <target>. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS property of <target>. The following arguments specify compile definitions. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items in the order called.

The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the following arguments. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the COMPILE_OPTIONS property of <target>. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_COMPILE_OPTIONS property of <target>. (IMPORTED targets only support INTERFACE items.) The following arguments specify compile options. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items in the order called.
trans-unit.target: 需要 INTERFACE ， PUBLIC 和 PRIVATE 关键字来指定以下参数的范围。 PRIVATE 和 PUBLIC 项目将填充 <target> 的 COMPILE_OPTIONS 属性。 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 项目将填充 <target> 的 INTERFACE_COMPILE_OPTIONS 属性。 （“ 导入的目标”仅支持 INTERFACE 项。）以下参数指定编译选项。重复调用相同的 <target> 会按调用顺序追加项目。

trans-unit.source: The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the following arguments. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the COMPILE_OPTIONS property of <target>. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_COMPILE_OPTIONS property of <target>. The following arguments specify compile options. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items in the order called.

The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the following arguments. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES property of <target>. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES property of <target>. (IMPORTED targets only support INTERFACE items.) The following arguments specify include directories.
trans-unit.target: 需要 INTERFACE ， PUBLIC 和 PRIVATE 关键字来指定以下参数的范围。 PRIVATE 和 PUBLIC 项目将填充 <target> 的 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 属性。 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 项目将填充 <target> 的 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 属性。 （“ 导入的目标”仅支持 INTERFACE 项。）以下参数指定包含目录。

trans-unit.source: The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the following arguments. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES property of <target>. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES property of <target>. The following arguments specify include directories.

The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the following arguments. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the LINK_OPTIONS property of <target>. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_LINK_OPTIONS property of <target>. (IMPORTED targets only support INTERFACE items.) The following arguments specify link options. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items in the order called.
trans-unit.target: 需要 INTERFACE ， PUBLIC 和 PRIVATE 关键字来指定以下参数的范围。 PRIVATE 和 PUBLIC 项目将填充 <target> 的 LINK_OPTIONS 属性。 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 项目将填充 <target> 的 INTERFACE_LINK_OPTIONS 属性。 （“ 导入的目标”仅支持 INTERFACE 项目。）以下参数指定链接选项。重复调用相同的 <target> 会按调用顺序追加项目。

trans-unit.source: The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the following arguments. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the LINK_OPTIONS property of <target>. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_LINK_OPTIONS property of <target>. The following arguments specify link options. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items in the order called.

The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the following arguments. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the PRECOMPILE_HEADERS property of <target>. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_PRECOMPILE_HEADERS property of <target> (IMPORTED targets only support INTERFACE items). Repeated calls for the same <target> will append items in the order called.
trans-unit.target: 需要 INTERFACE ， PUBLIC 和 PRIVATE 关键字来指定以下参数的范围。 PRIVATE 和 PUBLIC 项目将填充 <target> 的 PRECOMPILE_HEADERS 属性。 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 项目将填充 <target> 的 INTERFACE_PRECOMPILE_HEADERS 属性（导入的目标仅支持 INTERFACE 项目）。重复调用同一 <target> 将按调用顺序附加项目。

trans-unit.source: The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the following arguments. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the SOURCES property of <target>. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_SOURCES property of <target>. (IMPORTED targets only support INTERFACE items.) The following arguments specify sources. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items in the order called.
trans-unit.target: 需要 INTERFACE ， PUBLIC 和 PRIVATE 关键字来指定以下参数的范围。 PRIVATE 和 PUBLIC 项目将填充 <target> 的 SOURCES 属性。 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 项目将填充 <target> 的 INTERFACE_SOURCES 属性。 （“ 导入的目标”仅支持 INTERFACE 项目。）以下参数指定了来源。重复调用相同的 <target> 会按调用顺序追加项目。

trans-unit.source: The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the items following them. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the SOURCES property of <target>, which are used when building the target itself. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_SOURCES property of <target>, which are used when building dependents. (IMPORTED targets only support INTERFACE items because they are not build targets.) The following arguments specify sources. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items in the order called.
trans-unit.target: 需要 INTERFACE ， PUBLIC 和 PRIVATE 关键字来指定它们后面的项目的范围。 PRIVATE 和 PUBLIC 项目将填充 <target> 的 SOURCES 属性，该属性在构建目标本身时使用。 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 项目将填充 <target> 的 INTERFACE_SOURCES 属性，该属性在构建依赖项时使用。 （“导入的目标”仅支持“ INTERFACE 项目，因为它们不是构建目标。）以下参数指定了源。重复通话 <target> 按调用顺序附加项目。

trans-unit.source: The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the items following them. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the SOURCES property of <target>, which are used when building the target itself. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_SOURCES property of <target>, which are used when building dependents. The following arguments specify sources. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items in the order called. The targets created by add_custom_target() can only have PRIVATE scope.

The INTERFACE, PUBLIC and PRIVATE keywords are required to specify the scope of the items that follow them. PRIVATE and PUBLIC items will populate the LINK_DIRECTORIES property of <target>. PUBLIC and INTERFACE items will populate the INTERFACE_LINK_DIRECTORIES property of <target> (IMPORTED targets only support INTERFACE items). Each item specifies a link directory and will be converted to an absolute path if necessary before adding it to the relevant property. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items in the order called.
trans-unit.target: 需要 INTERFACE ， PUBLIC 和 PRIVATE 关键字来指定其后各项的范围。 PRIVATE 和 PUBLIC 项目将填充 <target> 的 LINK_DIRECTORIES 属性。 PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 项目将填充 <target> 的 INTERFACE_LINK_DIRECTORIES 属性（“ 导入的目标”仅支持 INTERFACE 项目）。每个项目都指定一个链接目录，如果有必要，在将其添加到相关属性之前，它将转换为绝对路径。重复要求相同 <target> 按调用顺序附加项目。

trans-unit.source: The INTERFACE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE property informs consumers of this target whether they must set their POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE property to ON. If this property is set to ON, then the POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE property on all consumers will be set to ON. Similarly, if this property is set to OFF, then the POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE property on all consumers will be set to OFF. If this property is undefined, then consumers will determine their POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE property by other means. Consumers must ensure that the targets that they link to have a consistent requirement for their INTERFACE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE property.
trans-unit.target: 该 INTERFACE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 属性通知消费者这一目标是否必须将其 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 属性设置为 ON 。如果将此属性设置为 ON ，则所有使用者上的 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 属性将设置为 ON 。同样，如果将此属性设置为 OFF ，则所有使用者上的 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 属性将设置为 OFF 。如果未定义此属性，则消费者将确定其 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 通过其他方式财产。消费者必须确保他们链接的目标对其 INTERFACE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 属性具有一致的要求。

trans-unit.source: The ISPC_INSTRUCTION_SETS target property must be used when generating for multiple instruction sets so that CMake can track what object files will be generated.
trans-unit.target: 该 ISPC_INSTRUCTION_SETS 目标属性必须生成多种指令集，这样的CMake可以跟踪的对象文件会产生什么时使用。

trans-unit.source: The LINKER: prefix can be specified as part of a SHELL: prefix expression.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 LINKER: 前缀指定为 SHELL: 前缀表达式的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The LINKER: prefix supports, as alternate syntax, specification of arguments using SHELL: prefix and space as separator. Previous example becomes "LINKER:SHELL:-z defs".
trans-unit.target: 的 LINKER: 前缀载体，作为候补的语法，使用参数规格 SHELL: 前缀和空间分离。上一个示例变为 "LINKER:SHELL:-z defs" 。

trans-unit.source: The LINKER: prefix supports, as an alternative syntax, specification of arguments using the SHELL: prefix and space as separator. The previous example then becomes "LINKER:SHELL:-z defs".
trans-unit.target: 的 LINKER: 前缀载体，作为替代的语法，使用所述参数规范 SHELL: 前缀和空间分离。然后，前面的示例变为 "LINKER:SHELL:-z defs" 。

trans-unit.source: The LINK_FLAGS property, managed as a string, can be used to add extra flags to the link step of a target. LINK_FLAGS_<CONFIG> will add to the configuration <CONFIG>, for example, DEBUG, RELEASE, MINSIZEREL, RELWITHDEBINFO, …
trans-unit.target: 该 LINK_FLAGS 财产，管理作为一个字符串，可用于额外的标志添加到目标的链接步骤。 LINK_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 将添加到配置 <CONFIG> 中，例如 DEBUG ， RELEASE ， MINSIZEREL ， RELWITHDEBINFO ……

trans-unit.source: The LINK_FLAGS property, managed as a string, can be used to add extra flags to the link step of a target. LINK_FLAGS_<CONFIG> will add to the configuration <CONFIG>, for example, DEBUG, RELEASE, MINSIZEREL, RELWITHDEBINFO, ...

The LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES mode appends the libraries to the INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES target property instead of using them for linking. If policy CMP0022 is not NEW, then this mode also appends libraries to the LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES and its per-configuration equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 该 LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES 模式追加库到 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES 目标属性，而不是使用它们联系起来。如果策略 CMP0022 不是 NEW ，那么此模式还将库附加到 LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES 及其等效配置。

trans-unit.source: The LINK_PUBLIC and LINK_PRIVATE modes can be used to specify both the link dependencies and the link interface in one command.
trans-unit.target: 的 LINK_PUBLIC 和 LINK_PRIVATE 模式可以被用于指定链接的依赖性和在一个命令的链路接口两者。

trans-unit.source: The LibXml2 package is considered to be found if both LIBXML2_LIBRARY and LIBXML2_INCLUDE_DIR are valid. Then also LibXml2_FOUND is set to TRUE. If it is not found and REQUIRED was used, it fails with a message(FATAL_ERROR), independent whether QUIET was used or not. If it is found, success will be reported, including the content of the first <required-var>. On repeated CMake runs, the same message will not be printed again.
trans-unit.target: 该 LibXml2 包被认为是如果同时被发现 LIBXML2_LIBRARY 和 LIBXML2_INCLUDE_DIR 是有效的。然后， LibXml2_FOUND 也设置为 TRUE 。如果找不到并使用了 REQUIRED ，则无论是否使用 QUIET ，它都会失败，并显示一条 message(FATAL_ERROR) 。如果找到，将报告成功，包括第一个 <required-var> 的内容。重复执行CMake时，将不再打印相同的消息。

trans-unit.source: The MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET environment variable sets the default value for the CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET variable.
trans-unit.target: 该 MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET 环境变量设置为默认值 CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET 变量。

trans-unit.source: The MESSAGE_NEVER option disables file installation status output.
trans-unit.target: 该 MESSAGE_NEVER 选项禁用文件安装状态输出。

trans-unit.source: The NAMESPACE option will prepend MathFunctions:: to the target names as they are written to the export file. This convention of double-colons gives CMake a hint that the name is an IMPORTED target when it is used by downstream projects. This way, CMake can issue a diagnostic message if the package providing it was not found.
trans-unit.target: 该 NAMESPACE 选项将预先准备 MathFunctions:: 因为他们被写入到导出文件的目标名称。双冒号的这种约定向CMake暗示了该名称在下游项目中使用时是 IMPORTED 目标。这样，如果找不到提供该软件包的软件包，CMake可以发出诊断消息。

trans-unit.source: The NEW behavior for this policy is to do nothing when a normal variable of the same name exists. The normal variable is not removed. The cache entry is not created or updated and is ignored if it exists.
trans-unit.target: 当存在相同名称的普通变量时，此策略的 NEW 行为是不执行任何操作。普通变量不会被删除。不会创建或更新高速缓存条目，如果存在，则将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: The NEW behavior for this policy is to ignore CMAKE_SHARED_LIBRARY_<Lang>_FLAGS whether it is modified or not and honor the POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE target property.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 NEW 行为是忽略 CMAKE_SHARED_LIBRARY_<Lang>_FLAGS ,无论是否对其进行了修改，并保留 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 目标属性。

trans-unit.source: The NEW behavior for this policy is to process GENERATED source files in AUTOMOC and AUTOUIC just like regular source files.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 NEW 行为是像常规源文件一样在 AUTOMOC 和 AUTOUIC 中处理 GENERATED 源文件。

trans-unit.source: The NEW behavior for this policy is to process .hh header files in AUTOMOC and AUTOUIC just like other header files.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 NEW 行为是像处理其他头文件一样，在 AUTOMOC 和 AUTOUIC 中处理 .hh 头文件。

trans-unit.source: The NEW behavior of this policy is to honor config-specific flag variabldes like CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_DEBUG.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 NEW 行为是遵守特定于配置的标志变量，例如 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_DEBUG 。

trans-unit.source: The NEW behavior of this policy is to initialize CMAKE_CUDA_ARCHITECTURES when CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER_ID is NVIDIA and raise an error if CUDA_ARCHITECTURES is empty during generation.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 NEW 行为是，当 CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER_ID 为 NVIDIA 时初始化 CMAKE_CUDA_ARCHITECTURES ，如果在生成过程中 CUDA_ARCHITECTURES 为空，则引发错误。

trans-unit.source: The NEW behavior of this policy is to only use the additional link flags when linking executables if the ENABLE_EXPORTS target property is set to True.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ENABLE_EXPORTS 目标属性设置为 True ，则此策略的 NEW 行为是仅在链接可执行文件时使用其他链接标志。

trans-unit.source: The NEW behavior of this policy is to prevent a target to link to itself through an ALIAS target.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 NEW 行为是防止目标通过 ALIAS 目标链接到自身。

trans-unit.source: The NEW behavior of this policy is to prevent target overwriting.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 NEW 行为是防止目标覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The NEW behavior of this policy is to raise an error on second call to export() command with same FILE without APPEND.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 NEW 行为是在第二次调用具有相同 FILE 而不带 APPEND 的 export() 命令时引发错误。

trans-unit.source: The NEW behavior of this policy is to report an error if an entry in the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES of a generator-expression conditionally linked IMPORTED target does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果生成器表达式有条件链接的 IMPORTED 目标的 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 中的条目不存在，则此策略的 NEW 行为是报告错误。

trans-unit.source: The NEW behavior of this policy is to use the link options during the device link step.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 NEW 行为是在设备链接步骤中使用链接选项。

trans-unit.source: The OBJECT library type defines a non-archival collection of object files resulting from compiling the given source files. The object files collection may be used as source inputs to other targets by using the syntax $<TARGET_OBJECTS:name>. This is a generator expression that can be used to supply the OBJECT library content to other targets:
trans-unit.target: 所述 OBJECT 库类型限定从编译给定的源文件生成的目标文件的一个非档案集合。通过使用语法 $<TARGET_OBJECTS:name> 可以将目标文件集合用作其他目标的源输入。这是一个 generator expression ，可用于将 OBJECT 库内容提供给其他目标：

trans-unit.source: The OBJECT library type defines a non-archival collection of object files resulting from compiling the given source files. The object files collection may be used as source inputs to other targets:
trans-unit.target: 所述 OBJECT 库类型限定从编译给定的源文件生成的目标文件的一个非档案集合。目标文件集合可用作其他目标的源输入：

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is for export(PACKAGE) command to populate the user package registry unless CMAKE_EXPORT_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY is enabled. The NEW behavior is for export(PACKAGE) command to do nothing unless the CMAKE_EXPORT_PACKAGE_REGISTRY is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 除非启用了 CMAKE_EXPORT_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY ,否则此策略的 OLD 行为是用于 export(PACKAGE) 命令来填充用户软件包注册表。在 NEW 行为是 export(PACKAGE) 命令，除非什么也不做 CMAKE_EXPORT_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 启用。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is for FindBoost to report Boost_VERSION as specified in the preprocessor definition BOOST_VERSION in boost/version.hpp. The NEW behavior for this policy is for FindBoost to report Boost_VERSION in x.y.z format.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是使 FindBoost 报告 boost/version.hpp 中的预处理器定义 BOOST_VERSION 中指定的 Boost_VERSION 。该 NEW 此策略的行为是 FindBoost 报告 Boost_VERSION 在 x.y.z 格式。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is for BISON_TARGET to use the current source directory for the WORKING_DIRECTORY and where to generate implicit files. The NEW behavior of this policy is to use the current binary directory for the WORKING_DIRECTORY and where to generate implicit files.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是 BISON_TARGET 将当前源目录用于 WORKING_DIRECTORY 以及在何处生成隐式文件。此策略的 NEW 行为是将当前的二进制目录用于 WORKING_DIRECTORY ,并在其中生成隐式文件。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is for FLEX_TARGET to use the current source directory for the WORKING_DIRECTORY and where to generate implicit files. The NEW behavior of this policy is to use the current binary directory for the WORKING_DIRECTORY relative to which implicit files are generated unless provided as absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是让 FLEX_TARGET 将当前源目录用于 WORKING_DIRECTORY 以及在何处生成隐式文件。该策略的 NEW 行为是将当前二进制目录用于 WORKING_DIRECTORY ,相对于该目录生成隐式文件，除非以绝对路径提供。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is for GIT_SUBMODULES when set to an empty string to initialize and update all git submodules. The NEW behavior for this policy is for GIT_SUBMODULES when set to an empty string to initialize and update no git submodules.
trans-unit.target: 设置为空字符串以初始化和更新所有git子模块时，此策略的 OLD 行为适用于 GIT_SUBMODULES 。设置为空字符串以初始化和更新git子模块时，此策略的 NEW 行为适用于 GIT_SUBMODULES 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is for find_program to require read permission but not execute permission. The NEW behavior for this policy is for find_program to require execute permission but not read permission.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是 find_program 需要读取权限，但不需要执行权限。此策略的 NEW 行为是 find_program 需要执行许可权，而不是读许可权。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is not to link executables to qtmain.lib automatically when they link to the QtCore IMPORTED target. The NEW behavior for this policy is to link executables to qtmain.lib automatically when they link to QtCore IMPORTED target.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是，当可执行文件链接到QtCore IMPORTED 目标时， qtmain.lib 自动将其链接到qtmain.lib。此策略的 NEW 行为是在链接到QtCore IMPORTED 目标时自动将可执行文件链接到 qtmain.lib 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is not to warn about relative paths in the LINK_DIRECTORIES target property. The NEW behavior for this policy is to issue a FATAL_ERROR if LINK_DIRECTORIES contains a relative path.
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是不会警告 LINK_DIRECTORIES 目标属性中的相对路径。如果 LINK_DIRECTORIES 包含相对路径，则此策略的 NEW 行为是发出 FATAL_ERROR 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is not to warn about relative paths in the INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES target property. The NEW behavior for this policy is to issue a FATAL_ERROR if INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES contains a relative path.
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是不会警告 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 目标属性中的相对路径。如果 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 包含相对路径，则此策略的 NEW 行为是发出 FATAL_ERROR 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to add -i to make calls in CTest. The NEW behavior for this policy is to not add -i.
trans-unit.target: 该 OLD 此策略的行为是添加 -i ，以 make 在CTEST电话。此策略的 NEW 行为是不添加 -i 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to add a dependency on the evaluated target for the above generator expressions. The NEW behavior of this policy is to not add a dependency on the evaluated target for the above generator expressions.
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是为上述生成器表达式添加对评估目标的依赖关系。此策略的 NEW 行为是不为上面的生成器表达式添加对评估目标的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to allow break() to be placed outside of loop contexts and ignores any arguments. The NEW behavior for this policy is to issue an error if a misplaced break or any arguments are found.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是允许将 break() 放置在循环上下文之外，并忽略任何参数。如果发现放错位置的中断或任何参数，则此策略的 NEW 行为是发出错误。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to allow a target to link to a target aliased to itself.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是允许目标链接到别名为自身的目标。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to allow creating targets with reserved names or which do not match the validity pattern. The NEW behavior for this policy is to report an error if an add_* command is used with an invalid target name.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是允许创建具有保留名称或与有效性模式不匹配的目标。如果将add_ *命令与无效的目标名称一起使用，则此策略的 NEW 行为是报告错误。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to allow including the result of an export() command. The NEW behavior for this policy is not to allow including the result of an export() command.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是允许包括 export() 命令的结果。此策略的 NEW 行为是不允许包含 export() 命令的结果。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to allow installing the result of an export() command. The NEW behavior for this policy is not to allow installing the result of an export() command.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是允许安装 export() 命令的结果。此策略的 NEW 行为是不允许安装 export() 命令的结果。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to allow keyword and plain target_link_libraries() signatures to be mixed. The NEW behavior for this policy is to not to allow mixing of the keyword and plain signatures.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是允许混合使用关键字和普通的 target_link_libraries() 签名。此策略的 NEW 行为是不允许混合使用关键字和纯签名。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to allow reading the LOCATION properties from build-targets. The NEW behavior for this policy is to not to allow reading the LOCATION properties from build-targets.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是允许从构建目标中读取 LOCATION 属性。此策略的 NEW 行为是不允许读取构建目标的 LOCATION 属性。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to allow target overwrite.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是允许目标覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to allow the use of add_custom_command() SOURCE signatures. The NEW behavior for this policy is to issue an error if such a signature is used.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是允许使用 add_custom_command() SOURCE签名。如果使用了这种签名，则此策略的 NEW 行为是发出错误。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ask the linker to search for libraries whose full paths are known to be in implicit link directories. The NEW behavior for this policy is to link libraries by full path even if they are in implicit link directories.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是要求链接程序搜索其完整路径已知在隐式链接目录中的库。此策略的 NEW 行为是按完整路径链接库，即使它们位于隐式链接目录中也是如此。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to consume the content of the suffixed COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_<CONFIG> target property when generating the compilation command. The NEW behavior for this policy is to ignore the content of the COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_<CONFIG> target property .
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是在生成编译命令时使用后缀为 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_<CONFIG> 的目标属性的内容。此策略的 NEW 行为是忽略 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_<CONFIG> 目标属性的内容。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to create the empty cache definition. The NEW behavior of this policy is to ignore variables which do not already exist in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是创建空的缓存定义。此策略的 NEW 行为是忽略缓存中不存在的变量。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to dereference variables and interpret keywords even if they are quoted or bracketed. The NEW behavior is to not dereference variables or interpret keywords that have been quoted or bracketed.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是取消引用变量并解释关键字，即使它们用引号引起来或放在方括号中也是如此。在 NEW 行为是不取消引用变量或解释已引用或括号的关键字。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to duplicate custom commands in dependent targets. The NEW behavior of this policy is to not duplicate custom commands in dependent targets.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是在相关目标中复制自定义命令。此策略的 NEW 行为是不要在依赖目标中复制自定义命令。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to expand such variables when processing the target sources. The NEW behavior for this policy is to issue an error if such variables need to be expanded.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是在处理目标源时扩展此类变量。如果需要扩展此类变量，则此策略的 NEW 行为是发出错误。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to export the content of the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES with the source or binary directory. The NEW behavior for this policy is to issue an error if such a directory is used.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是使用源目录或二进制目录导出 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 的内容。如果使用这样的目录，则此策略的 NEW 行为是发出错误。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to fall back to the RUNTIME DESTINATION if a BUNDLE DESTINATION is not given. The NEW behavior for this policy is to produce an error if a bundle target is installed without a BUNDLE DESTINATION.
trans-unit.target: 该 OLD 此策略行为是回落到 RUNTIME DESTINATION 如果 BUNDLE DESTINATION 没有给出。如果安装的捆绑包目标没有 BUNDLE DESTINATION ，则此策略的 NEW 行为是产生错误。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to honor the legacy behavior for variable references and escape sequences. The NEW behavior is to use the simpler variable expansion and escape sequence evaluation rules.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是兑现变量引用和转义序列的旧行为。在 NEW 行为是使用简单的变量扩展和转义序列评价规则。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore GENERATED source files in AUTOMOC and AUTOUIC.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略 AUTOMOC 和 AUTOUIC 中的 GENERATED 源文件。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore <PackageName>_ROOT variables. The NEW behavior for this policy is to use <PackageName>_ROOT variables.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略 <PackageName>_ROOT 变量。此策略的 NEW 行为是使用 <PackageName>_ROOT 变量。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore .hh header files in AUTOMOC and AUTOUIC.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略 AUTOMOC 和 AUTOUIC 中的 .hh 头文件。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore CMAKE_REQUIRED_LIBRARIES in the include file check macros. The NEW behavior of this policy is to honor CMAKE_REQUIRED_LIBRARIES in the include file check macros.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略包含文件检查宏中的 CMAKE_REQUIRED_LIBRARIES 。此策略的 NEW 行为是在包含文件检查宏中使用 CMAKE_REQUIRED_LIBRARIES 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore attempts to set the link libraries of utility targets. The NEW behavior for this policy is to report an error if an attempt is made to set the link libraries of a utility target.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略尝试设置实用程序目标的链接库的尝试。如果尝试设置实用程序目标的链接库，则此策略的 NEW 行为是报告错误。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore custom commands for unknown targets. The NEW behavior for this policy is to report an error if the target referenced in add_custom_command() is unknown or was defined outside the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略未知目标的自定义命令。如果在 add_custom_command() 中引用的目标未知或在当前目录之外定义的目标，则此策略的 NEW 行为是报告错误。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore relative path entries if they contain a generator expression. The NEW behavior for this policy is to report an error if a generator expression appears in another location and the path is relative.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略相对路径条目（如果它们包含生成器表达式）。如果生成器表达式出现在另一个位置并且路径是相对的，则此策略的 NEW 行为是报告错误。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore targets which list themselves in their own link implementation. The NEW behavior for this policy is to report an error if a target attempts to link to itself.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略在自己的链接实现中列出自己的目标。此策略的 NEW 行为是：如果目标尝试链接到自身，则报告错误。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore the INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES property for in-build targets. The NEW behavior for this policy is to use the INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES property for in-build targets, and ignore the old properties matching (IMPORTED_)?LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES(_<CONFIG>)?.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略内置目标的 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES 属性。此策略的 NEW 行为是将 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES 属性用于内置目标，而忽略匹配 (IMPORTED_)?LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES(_<CONFIG>)? 的旧属性？LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES（_ <CONFIG>）？。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore the POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE property for all targets and use the modified value of CMAKE_SHARED_LIBRARY_<Lang>_FLAGS for SHARED and MODULE libraries.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略所有目标的 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 属性，并为 SHARED 和 MODULE 库使用 CMAKE_SHARED_LIBRARY_<Lang>_FLAGS 的修改后的值。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore the TEST operator. The NEW behavior is to interpret the TEST operator.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略 TEST 运算符。在 NEW 行为是解释 TEST 操作。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore the IN_LIST operator. The NEW behavior is to interpret the IN_LIST operator.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略IN_LIST运算符。在 NEW 行为解释IN_LIST操作。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore the link options.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略链接选项。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore the visibility properties for static libraries, object libraries, and executables without exports. The NEW behavior for this policy is to honor the visibility properties for all target types.
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是忽略静态库，对象库和可执行文件的可见性属性，而无需导出。此策略的 NEW 行为是保留所有目标类型的可见性属性。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to implicitly append known extensions to source files if they can't be found. The NEW behavior of this policy is to not append known extensions and require them to be explicit.

The OLD behavior for this policy is to implicitly dereference variables named like numbers and boolean constants. The NEW behavior for this policy is to recognize numbers and boolean constants without dereferencing variables with such names.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是隐式取消引用名为数字和布尔常量的变量。此策略的 NEW 行为是识别数字和布尔常量，而不用这种名称反引用变量。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to interpret the LANGUAGE <LANG> property using its undocumented meaning to "use the <LANG> compiler". The NEW behavior for this policy is to interpret the LANGUAGE <LANG> property using its documented meaning to "compile as a <LANG> source".

The OLD behavior for this policy is to issue no warning and set the result variable to a -NOTFOUND value. The NEW behavior for this policy is to issue a FATAL_ERROR if the command is called with a non-existent target.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是不发出警告，并将结果变量设置为 -NOTFOUND 值。如果使用不存在的目标调用该命令，则此策略的 NEW 行为是发出 FATAL_ERROR 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to leave VERSION variables untouched. The NEW behavior for this policy is to set VERSION as documented by the project() command.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是保持 VERSION 变量不变。此策略的 NEW 行为是设置 project() 命令记录的 VERSION 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to never pass -module option. The NEW behavior is to pass -module option to SWIG compiler if SWIG_MODULE_NAME is specified.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是永不通过 -module 选项。在 NEW 行为是通过 -module 选项 SWIG 如果编译器 SWIG_MODULE_NAME 指定。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to not honor BEFORE keyword in private scope. The NEW behavior of this policy is to honor BEFORE keyword in all scopes.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是不接受私有范围内的 BEFORE 关键字。此策略的 NEW 行为是在所有范围内都使用 BEFORE 关键字。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to not initialize CMAKE_CUDA_ARCHITECTURES when CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER_ID is NVIDIA. Empty CUDA_ARCHITECTURES is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 当 CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER_ID 为 NVIDIA 时，此策略的 OLD 行为是不初始化 CMAKE_CUDA_ARCHITECTURES 。允许为空的 CUDA_ARCHITECTURES 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to not manage PIE link flags. The NEW behavior is to add link flags if POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE is set:
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是不管理 PIE 链接标志。在 NEW 行为是添加链接标志，如果 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 是集：

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to not propagate interface link properties. The NEW behavior of this policy is to propagate interface link properties.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是不传播​​接口链接属性。此策略的 NEW 行为是传播接口链接属性。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to not set the value of the CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS variable in the generated test project. The NEW behavior for this policy is to set the value of the CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS variable in the test project to the same as it is in the calling project.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是不要在生成的测试项目中设置 CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS 变量的值。此策略的 NEW 行为是将测试项目中的 CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS 变量的值设置为与调用项目中的值相同。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to omit TARGET_OBJECTS expressions from the SOURCES target property. The NEW behavior for this policy is to include TARGET_OBJECTS expressions in the output.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是从 SOURCES 目标属性中忽略 TARGET_OBJECTS 表达式。此策略的 NEW 行为是在输出中包含 TARGET_OBJECTS 表达式。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to pass the DEPFILE to Ninja unaltered. The NEW behavior for this policy is to transform the DEPFILE after running the custom command. The status of CMP0116 is recorded at the time of the custom command's creation, and you can have custom commands in the same directory with different values for CMP0116 by setting the policy before each custom command.

The OLD behavior for this policy is to perform a case-insensitive comparison with the value in the <LANG>_COMPILER_ID expression. The NEW behavior for this policy is to perform a case-sensitive comparison with the value in the <LANG>_COMPILER_ID expression.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是与 <LANG>_COMPILER_ID 表达式中的值执行不区分大小写的比较。此策略的 NEW 行为是与 <LANG>_COMPILER_ID 表达式中的值进行区分大小写的比较。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to place MSVC runtime library flags in the default CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> cache entries and ignore the CMAKE_MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY abstraction.
